title: Sectograph. Day & Time planner
description: Sectograph is a time planner that visually displays a list of tasks and events for the day in the form of a 12-hour pie chart - a watch dial.The application will help you sharpen your sense of time and allow you to visualize your day.HOW IT WORKSIn short, it is a projection of your routine and tasks onto the clock face. It visualizes your day for precise timekeeping and offers you peace of mind.The scheduler works like an analog clock face. It automatically fetches all the events from your Google calendar (or local calendar) and places them on a 12-hour sectored watch face. This technology can be called a "Calendar clock".HOW IT LOOKSThe list of your calendar events is projected in the form of a pie chart in the application and on the home screen widget.Events are sectors, the beginning and duration of which you can clearly track using special arcs to follow your plan.A calendar and analog clock combined gives you an amazingly visual representation of your work, allowing you to effectively plan and calculate your day.WHAT CAN THE APPLICATION BE USED FOR?‚úî Daily scheduling and visual timing. Track your daily tasks, agendas, appointments, and events in Sectograph, and at any time, find out how much time is left until the end of the current event and the start of the next one. Don't be late.‚úî Accounting and control of working hours. Keep your phone in the docking station at your workstation and your office day plan is under control.‚úî Schedule of classes. Keep your phone close at hand and see how much time is left until the end of those tiring lectures ‚Äì and never be late for lab work again.‚úî Self-organization at home. Your daily routine is now more convenient than ever. Remember to balance work, rest and physical activity, just use the app as an organizer for your home routine.‚úî Trip timer and flight duration. Do you lose track of time due to endless travel and flights? Visually control your check-in, landing and flight duration. Keep everything under control.‚úî Follow your meal schedule, medication schedule, exercise therapy, and other important activities. Lead the right lifestyle and be healthy!‚úî Convenient countdown of any lengthy scheduled events. Don't miss the end of your vacation and know exactly how many days are left until the end of your military service.‚úî Monitor everyday affairs on the go and in your car. Achieve your goals by keeping the application installed on the device.‚úî Time management using GTD technology. Is planning your day confusing? With the function of striking out or hiding flagged events, keep your chart as clean as possible. Sectograph will improve your time management.‚úî My goals. The app can be used to achieve goals from your Google calendar. It will help you with timekeeping, organize your day, and assist you in completing your goals on time.‚úî Attention-deficit. According to our users, the application is effective for attention-deficit hyperactivity syndrome (ADHD). If you are wasting time and have trouble concentrating on tasks, this app may be useful to you.‚úî The application will be useful for fans of the "Chronodex" concept. You can use the Sectograph as an analog of a paper diary used by this concept.‚úî Display doings from Microsoft Outlook calendar. (beta)SMARTWATCH on Wear OSDo you have a Wear OS smartwatch?Great! Use the Sectograph tile or watch face. Now your smart watch will become an effective planner!HOME SCREEN WIDGETUse the day planner widget on your device's home screen.The widget automatically updates events and its clock once a minute, as well as after any new events appear in the calendar.You can view details of the event on the widget and access some of its options by clicking on the corresponding sector.Author and developer: Roman Blokhin

title: Simpler: English learning app
description: Learning English is now easier than ever! Try Simpler now.SIMPLER APP is an effective and helpful tool for language learners of all levels.SIMPLER ENGLISH COURSE FEATURES‚òÖ GRAMMAR in the form of short and simple topics ‚òÖ DETECTIVE STORIES: a fun new way to practice your English‚òÖ Free daily access to TREASURE CHESTS with useful new words‚òÖ Effective DRILLS for each grammar topic‚òÖ ASSOCIATIVE word learning‚òÖ Authentic LISTENING materialLearn and master the English language FOR FREE with SIMPLER!Simpler English course includes grammar, vocabulary and speaking modules.HOW DID WE DEVELOP SUCH A SIMPLE AND EFFICIENT TOOL FOR LEARNING ENGLISH FROM SCRATCH?1. We've developed an accessible and effective GRAMMAR COURSE for all-level learners.  English grammar can be confusing and overwhelming. Good news: we've done all the hard work for you. We took the most essential and relevant grammar and broke it down into bite-sized topics complete with drills. Each topic is a simple rule or structure, which comes with an instant comprehension check. With this system you can learn English grammar from the basics, all by yourself.2.We've created an improved FLASHCARD LIBRARY for more effective word learning. Each flashcard has a sentence which helps memorize the word using associations. The app uses spaced repetition to help you remember every word. Expand your vocabulary fast with Simpler. 3. At Simpler we know the importance of listening skills and learning the correct pronunciation from the very beginning. That's why every phrase in our exercises is voiced by a native speaker. And in our PRACTICE section you can put new grammar and vocabulary to use and role play one of the two speakers in a real-life dialogue.  4. DRILLS are one of the key elements of our course. These are grammar exercises, such as completing a sentence or typing in the translation of a phrase. The drills train you to formulate correct sentences and use new grammar without even thinking about it. Some of the previously learned grammar is regularly added to your drills to keep your memory strong. We use various types of exercises in our drills to maximize the efficiency and make them fun. 5. Practice makes perfect. You can select RAPID PACE and set your DAILY GOAL for extra motivation. Practice regularly and see the effects within a week! ¬†7. A UNIQUE FEATURE: Enjoy thrilling detective stories adapted for English learners! Learn new words and phrases and start thinking in English as you solve crimes and mysteries. With Simpler you can learn English for free.üì≠  CONTACT USIf you have suggestions or comments on Simpler App, please, send them to: help@simpler.link. We appreciate your feedback.

title: Parental Control: Porn Blocker
developer: Non-traderThis developer has not identified itself as a trader. For consumers in the European Union
description: OverviewParental control app that denies access to porn sites. It uses a semantic parser that scans and blocks all kind of adult content.Parental Control: Porn Blocker ## Comprehensive Digital Protection for Your Children In today's digital world, children have unprecedented access to the internet. While this connectivity brings valuable educational resources and entertainment, it also exposes them to potentially harmful content. Parental Control: Porn Blocker is an advanced browser extension designed specifically to protect your children from accessing inappropriate adult content online. ## Free vs Premium Features ### ‚úÖ **FREE VERSION** - Basic Protection - **Adult Content Blocking** - Always enabled, cannot be disabled - **Basic Content Detection** - Blocks obvious inappropriate material - **Simple Statistics** - Shows number of blocked sites - **Safe Browsing** - Redirects to safe pages when content is blocked ### üöÄ **PREMIUM VERSION** - Advanced Family Protection #### **Enhanced Content Filtering** - **5x More Sensitive Detection** - Catches subtle inappropriate content - **Multiple Category Blocking** - Violence, drugs, gambling, hate speech - **Adjustable Sensitivity Levels** - Low, Medium, High filtering options -**Password Protection** - Only parents can access and modify settings ## Intelligent Content Analysis Technology Unlike basic blockers that rely solely on blacklists, our extension employs sophisticated semantic analysis technology that scans entire webpages in real-time. This proprietary algorithm examines not just URLs, but also meta tags and page content to identify potentially inappropriate material. By analyzing context and content density, our solution can detect adult content even on previously unknown websites or those attempting to circumvent traditional blocking methods. ## Instant Protection, Zero Configuration From the moment you install Parental Control: Porn Blocker, it begins working seamlessly in the background: - **Immediate Activation**: No complex setup procedures or configuration needed - **Automatic Updates**: Our protection evolves to counter new threats - **Invisible Operation**: Works silently without disrupting normal browsing - **Zero Maintenance**: No ongoing adjustments required ## Comprehensive Safety Features Our extension offers multiple layers of protection: - **Real-time Content Analysis**: Detects adult terminology, inappropriate contexts, and explicit content - **Smart Redirects**: Instantly redirects from inappropriate sites to safe alternatives - **Whitelisted Safe Sites**: Ensures educational resources remain accessible - **Visual Blocking Interface**: Age-appropriate messaging when content is blocked - **Protection Statistics**: Monitor effectiveness through the simple dashboard ## Child-Friendly Blocked Page When potentially harmful content is detected, children are presented with a friendly, non-frightening blocked page that: - Explains that the content is not appropriate in child-friendly language - Offers navigation options to return to safe browsing - Features engaging, kid-friendly design elements - Redirects to safe search alternatives ## Why Choose Parental Control: Porn Blocker? ### Superior Detection Technology Our semantic analysis engine goes beyond simple keyword filtering. By understanding context and content relationships, it can identify inappropriate material even when sites attempt to use code words or alternative terminology. ### Education-Friendly Design We understand the importance of educational resources. Our carefully curated whitelist ensures that legitimate educational sites discussing biology, health education, or historical topics remain accessible while still blocking truly harmful content. ###

description: OverviewFocus blocks websites so you can focus on schoolwork. Focus blocks distracting websites, while allowing you access to the sites you need. Focus lets you do better work in less time. THE CHALLENGE Do you work or study on your computer? Then you‚Äôve been distracted by news, social media, shopping, email. These distractions lead you to drift off-task, waste time, and end up unproductive and unfulfilled. We‚Äôve all been there. The temptation of opening a new browser tab to find a new distraction is strong and the action is often compulsive. We all have specific sites that are our go-to distractions, but we also know that anything we click has the potential to become a distraction. except for the tools we‚Äôre using to get our work or studying done. You tell Focus what sites you do need for work or schoolwork, and it will block everything else. You‚Äôll stay focused and on-task, while doing high quality work because of your sustained attention. description: OverviewA simple extension Pomodoro timer with to-do lists, focusing on work.Begin using the pomodoro technique to increase your productivity at work/when you are studying. Here is how this extension works. You have a large project/task to work on. Once you have installed our software extension, start writing and break down the large project into small individual tasks. Here is an example of how you could use this extension. - Studying for History Exam - Subtasks/Mini-tasks would be - Study the Civil War - Study factors which led to civil war etc. Once you have broken down the project into mini tasks, begin studying by pressing the "play" button. After four cycles, take a longer break (15‚Äì30 minutes). This scientifically backed method improves concentration, efficiency, and work-life balance, making it especially helpful for those with ADHD or trouble staying focused. title: ADHD Reading Help
developer: Non-traderThis developer has not identified itself as a trader. For consumers in the European Union
category: Follows recommended practices for Chrome extensions. Learn more.
description: OverviewThe ADHD Text Enhancer is a powerful tool designed to support individuals with ADHD and other neurodivergent conditions in‚Ä¶The ADHD Text Enhancer is a powerful tool designed to support individuals with ADHD and other neurodivergent conditions in improving their reading experience. This browser extension offers a unique functionality that enhances the legibility of text on webpages, making reading more accessible and comfortable. How It Works: The ADHD Reading Helper is a lightweight and user-friendly Chrome extension that modifies the text on webpages to improve readability. Once installed, simply activate the extension by clicking on the icon in your browser's toolbar. The extension then scans the entire webpage and intelligently makes the first few letters of each word bold, providing a visual cue that aids concentration and comprehension. Also, just REFRESH the page if you want to turn the extension OFF. Converting PDFs: To convert PDFs for use with the ADHD Reading Helper, you'll first need to convert the PDF to HTML format using any reliable PDF-to-HTML converter available online. Once the PDF is converted to HTML, you can utilize the extension to enhance the legibility of the text within the HTML version of the document. Undoing Changes and Infinite Pages: If you wish to undo the text modifications made by the extension, simply refresh the webpage, and the text will revert back to its original state. It's important to note that when browsing on infinite scrolling pages or dynamically loaded content, you may need to reapply the extension's enhancements to each new set of data. This ensures that the extension respects your consent and doesn't automatically modify new content without your permission. Benefits for Neurodivergent Individuals: The ADHD Reading Helper offers numerous benefits for neurodivergent individuals, including those with ADHD. By enhancing text legibility, the extension provides a clear visual cue that aids concentration, reduces visual distractions, and improves reading comprehension. It helps individuals stay focused, engaged, and effectively navigate online content, making the reading experience more enjoyable and accessible. Conclusion: The ADHD Reading Helper Chrome extension is a valuable tool for individuals with ADHD and other neurodivergent conditions seeking to enhance their reading experience. With its simple yet effective approach of making the first few letters of each word bold, the extension provides a visual cue that aids concentration and improves text legibility. Whether you're reading articles, blogs, or any online content, the ADHD Reading Helper can make a significant difference in your ability to comprehend and engage with the text. Install the ADHD Reading Helper today and unlock a more accessible and enjoyable reading experience.See less

title: Focus Indicator
developer: Non-traderThis developer has not identified itself as a trader. For consumers in the European Union
description: OverviewAdds a high-contrast outline around the element with keyboard focusI predominantly use my keyboard to navigate websites, but many sites don't always make it clear where the keyboard is focused. This extension aims to help solve that issue by putting a white or black border around the focused element, depending on whichever results in a higher contrast. Focus Indicator uses multiple strategies to aim for it to work effectively across all websites, but it can't account for every improper accessibility setup. For example, if a site has a focusable element out of the screen's bounds, it won't show any difference. It also doesn't affect which elements are able to be focused with the keyboard. It prioritizes function over form. If you'd like, you can disable the extension on certain sites (blacklist them) or you can enable the extension only on certain sites (whitelist them). All settings can be configured by clicking on the extension's icon. There are two focus indication methods, depending on your preference: 1. Overlay (default, new with version 2) - Works by having a floating outline above the current focused element's position - Almost guaranteed to show the outline if it is possible to, EVEN IF the focused element is behind another element 2. On Element - Works by modifying the current element's focused styles - The indicator will sometimes end up partly or fully covered up by other elements, but it can be less intrusive Overlay Mode settings: - Indicator color mode - Solid (default) - The outline will be either solid black or solid white - Hybrid - The outline will be a black and white inversion of whatever is directly behind each individual portion of it - Outline width (default: 4px) - Adjust the thickness of the outline - Outline offset (default: 1px) - Set how much space there is between the element and the outline - Use transition between focused elements (default: off) - Animates focus shifts for better visual tracking - Use "On Element" mode for text input elements (default: on) - The overlay may cover text while typing in certain text input elements, mainly in online code editors, so "On Element" mode can be used for just those elements insteadSee less

description: OverviewFree site blocker for enhanced productivity. Custom blocklist and password protection. Site blocker is designed to help you stay focused on studying, learning, and working. Blocks all time-westing websites to keep you productive and away from all the distractions the internet offers. To use a site blocker, set a password, decide which websites you want access to, and let the site blocker block the rest. If you want to visit a site you have blocked, enter your password, and decide how long you want to be on the blocked site. If you‚Äôre a parent, you can set the password for your child. Or, if you‚Äôd like to use it yourself, have a friend or partner put it for you to help you concentrate. And voila! You now have a set of internet guardrails that help to help you stay productive and on task whether you‚Äôre studying, remote learning, or need an extra boost of self-control to finish a project. ‚≠êÔ∏èFeatures‚≠êÔ∏è üëâ Block sites, including its subdomains Remove all distracting and harmful websites from your life by blocking them for you while you need to stay focused and productive. üëâ Allowlist Add exceptions to the blocked websites list. This can make your work or studying more efficient and effective. - Breaks: The technique involves taking short breaks (usually 5 minutes) after each time block (25-minute work period), which can help to prevent mental fatigue and maintain a high level of productivity throughout the day. - Work-Life Balance: By dividing your day into clear work periods and breaks, the Focus Timer can help to improve your work-life balance. It allows you to ensure that you're not working or studying for too long without a break, which can be beneficial for your mental and physical health. - Reducing Procrastination: The thought of working for just 25 minutes can be less daunting than the idea of working for several hours. developer: Non-traderThis developer has not identified itself as a trader. For consumers in the European Union
category: Follows recommended practices for Chrome extensions. Learn more.
description: OverviewThe Pomodoro Technique - Focus. Relax. Improve. Achieve.Pomodoro Technique is a time management method by Francesco Cirillo in the 1980s *****There are six steps in the original technique***** 1. Decide on the task to be done. 2. Set the Pomodoro timer (traditionally to 25 minutes). 3. Work on the task. 4. End work when the timer rings and put a checkmark on a piece of paper. 5. If you have fewer than four checkmarks, take a short break (3‚Äì5 minutes) and then return to step 2; otherwise continue to step 6. 6. After four Pomodoros, take a longer break (15‚Äì30 minutes), reset your checkmark count to zero, then go to step 1. Application developed by Linh Okita and Nyan.See less

title: Slides Timer

category: Follows recommended practices for Chrome extensions. Learn more.
description: OverviewCreate timers using placeholders. ie <<0:00+>>, <<5:00->>, <<time>>, <<date>>, <<shortdate>>, <<longdate>>Pause and restart timers with the d key. Reset timers with the e key. Add $ in a count down or up timer to start it in a paused state. More granular time formatting. Be sure to refresh your slides after you install for the timer to work. Slides Timer is an extension which will automatically bring timers to life in presented slides. Times placed between << and >> will be replaced with a timer. Use - as the last character to count down from the specified time. Use + to count up from the specified time. use <<time>> to display the current time. Example: <<5:00->> will count down starting at 5 minutes. <<2:00+>> will count up starting at 2 minutes <<time>> will display the current time <<time^>> will display the current time without seconds <<time&>> will display the current time without am/pm <<time^&>> will display the current time without seconds and am/pm <<date>> will display numeric dates in / format <<shortdate>> will display abbreviated word date values <<longdate>> will display full word date values <<00:30-->> will advance to the previous slide on countdown <<00:30-+>> will advance to the next slide on countdown <<00:30-@>> will trigger inserted audio on countdown <<00:30-!>> will trigger inserted video on countdown <<00:30-~>> will continuously countdown when navigating slides. <<00:30+~>> will continuously count-up when navigating slides. <<time>> and <<date>> can now handle more granular formatting. <<time|hh:mm:ss>> will format as hours minutes seconds <<date|dd-MM-yyyy>> will format with day, month year h - single digit 12 hour hh - double digit 12 hour H - single digit 24 hour HH - double digit 24 hour m - single digit minute mm - double digit minute s - single digit second ss - double digit second d - single digit day dd - double digit day ddd - short weekday dddd - long weekday M - single digit month MM - double digit month MMM - abbreviated month MMMM - long month yy - double digit year yyyy - four digit year This extension does not handle user data.See less

description: OverviewEasily block websites of your choice!Block Site is a browser extension to help you block desired websites (domains). description: OverviewBlock distracting websites with a focus timer system for productive work sessions# Distraction Blocker ‚Äî Focus Timer for the Web ‚ú® A Chrome extension that helps you stay focused by setting daily time limits per website, giving you a gentle nudge when time is up, and keeping controls at your fingertips via a floating button and right-side sidebar. ## üåü Highlights - üü¶ Floating, draggable right-edge button showing remaining time - üß≠ Slide‚Äëin sidebar from the right with quick controls - ‚è±Ô∏è Per‚Äësite Daily Time Limits (1‚Äì1440 minutes) - üîî Polite, motivational full‚Äëpage modal when time is up - ‚òï Temporary break (15 min) blocking when you choose to take a pause - ‚ôªÔ∏è Reset Today‚Äôs Timer instantly (sidebar and button update immediately) - üß† Heartbeat tracking (no tab switching needed; time accrues automatically) - ‚öôÔ∏è Robust Options page with presets and full settings ## üßë‚Äçüíª How It Works - The extension tracks time per hostname. You set a daily limit for each site. - A small rectangular floating button sits on the right edge. It shows remaining time and can be dragged vertically. It expands on hover. - Click the button to open a right‚Äëside sidebar with: - Current site: set/remove limit, quick time buttons, usage summary - Today‚Äôs usage across your blocked sites - ‚ÄúOpen Full Settings‚Äù (Options page) - When your time is up, a friendly modal appears in the center of the page with options: - Set New Limit & Continue - Reset Today‚Äôs Timer (usage‚Üí0 for current site) - Take a 15 min Break (temporarily blocks the site) - Continue without changes - A background heartbeat (every minute) accrues time even when you stay on the same tab, so the time‚Äëup modal shows without needing to switch tabs. ## üîß Key Features - üïπÔ∏è Floating Button - Shows remaining time - Draggable on the right edge - Expands on hover - üìä Sidebar Controls - Set per‚Äësite limit (1‚Äì1440 minutes) - Quick add: 15m / 30m / 1h / 2h - Remove limit - See current site usage + remaining time - Open Full Settings - üßò Time‚ÄëUp Modal (Polite & Motivational) - Clear, friendly language encouraging focus - Choose to continue, reset, take a break, or set a new limit - Blocks page interaction until you choose (persistent modal) - ‚ôªÔ∏è Instant UI Refresh - Reset Today‚Äôs Timer updates the sidebar and floating button immediately - Background sends a message to refresh visible UI - ‚è≥ Heartbeat Tracking - A 1‚Äëminute alarm accrues time periodically - Time‚Äëup is detected even without tab switching ## ‚öôÔ∏è Options (Full Settings) - Add/remove blocked sites - Set reminder block duration (temporary block after reminder) - Preset adders for common distracting sites - Start Fresh: clear all local data (with confirmation) ## üöÄ Quick Start 1. Load the extension (see Install). 2. Visit a site like YouTube. 3. Click the floating button ‚Üí set a Daily Time Limit (e.g., 15 minutes). 4. Work/browse; when time‚Äôs up, you‚Äôll see the modal. 5. Use the sidebar at any time to adjust limits. ## üß™ Testing Tips - To see the modal quickly, set a 1‚Äëminute limit. The heartbeat will trigger the modal after about a minute even if you don‚Äôt leave the tab. - You can also switch tabs briefly to force an immediate time update.See less

description: OverviewHedge is a web browser extension designed to help you stay focused and achieve your goals by blocking distracting websites.You know that moment when you're finally ready to tackle your to-do list? Meanwhile, that important task? Still sitting there, untouched. Hedge is here to help break this cycle. It's not another complicated "productivity system" ‚Äì it's a straightforward Chrome extension that helps you stay focused by keeping you away from the sites that always seem to pull you away from what matters. Key Features: ‚è∞ Smart Time Blocking: Set your active hours (like 9 AM to 5 PM) and working days to automatically enable site blocking during your productive hours. Because your focus time should match your actual work schedule. üéØ Goal-Aligned Blocking: Set your work hours and active days to automatically keep distracting sites at bay when you need to focus. Because we all know willpower alone isn't enough. ‚ö° Smart Pomodoro Timer: Built-in 25-minute focus sessions with short (5-minute) and long (15-minute) breaks help you maintain actual, sustainable productivity. No more "just 5 more minutes" that turns into 3 hours. üîí Flexible Site Access: Block entire domains (like youtube*) or specific pages. Whitelist the stuff you actually need, blacklist the stuff that keeps stealing your time. Simple as that. ‚ò¢Ô∏è Nuclear Mode: When you absolutely, positively MUST get something done, enable Nuclear Mode. It locks your blocking settings until your predetermined time is up. Take back control of your time with Hedge. Whether you're a student trying to survive finals week, a professional working on important projects, or just someone who wants to be more intentional with their browsing habits, Hedge helps you stay focused on what actually matters. We Value Your Input! üåü Your feedback helps make Hedge better! If you find Hedge helpful in your productivity journey, please consider leaving us a 5-star review. Got ideas, questions, bugs, or just want to share your Hedge success story? Drop us a line at info@hedge.coach or submit your feedback through the extension popup. About Permissions ‚ÑπÔ∏è When you install Hedge, you'll notice it requests permission to "Read and change all your data on the websites you visit." title: Visual Timer
developer: Non-traderThis developer has not identified itself as a trader. For consumers in the European Union
category: Follows recommended practices for Chrome extensions. Learn more.
description: OverviewA visual timer to help you focus on your current task.This timer is designed to help you be more productive by keeping your fingers on the keyboard. Click the extension icon from your browser to pop a new timer (or bring the existing one into the foreground). Then just type the number of minutes you want the timer to run for and hit Enter. The timer will start as a countdown, filling up as the timer runs so you'll know roughly how much time you have left without breaking your concentration. Once the timer completes, it begins flashing so you know it's complete. If you need to pause the timer, just select the timer popup and hit Space. Space again to resume. If you want to reset the timer (for the previously selected duration) just select the timer popup and hit "R" and it will start over. Cheatsheet for keyboard shortcuts: - 1-999 : Start a timer for that many minutes - R : Reset the timer - Space : Pause/resume the timer - ? : Toggle config mode (where you can set the background color, toggle the "ding") - T : Toggle task mode where you can list your tasks and start a timer for each - > (right angle bracket) : Mark current task done (delete it) and begin next task New in this version (1.4.0): * Gamification! Under settings you can opt in to setting a target number of minutes working on tasks (timers must be started from the tasks list) and track your streak. Feel the productivity points as you make a daily habit for spending at least an hour working on tasks. * More icons for those that aren't used to keyboard shortcuts: start/pause toggle icon, restart icon, task list icon New in 1.3.0 (June 2, 2025): * Set a timer up to 999 minutes (removed limitation of 99 minutes) * Visual fixes in task list (wrapping, general ugliness) * Stay in the flow and jump right to your next task!! Added new keyboard shortcut (">") to mark current task done (deleting it from the task list) and beginning the next task. Thanks to everyone who has commented on the Youtube instructional video to provide feedback and request new features!See less

title: Firefox Focus: Privacy browser
description:
Use Firefox Focus for everything you want to keep separate from your main browser ‚Äî for all those get in get out and forget about it moments. No tabs, no fuss, no muss. Block ads and online trackers too. One tap, and your browsing history is completely destroyed. 
 
Blocking distracting ads also means faster page loads which means Focus gets you where you want to go a lot faster. Firefox Focus is the perfect get in/get out, search and destroy, I‚Äôm on a mission that‚Äôs none-of-your-business ‚Äî web browser. 

NEW DISTRACTION-FREE DESIGN
When you open Focus, you just get the awesome bar and the keyboard for super quick searching. That‚Äôs it. No recent history, no past sites, no open tabs, no ads, no distractions. Just a simple, minimal design with menus that make sense.  

ONE TAP TO DELETE HISTORY
Erase your history, passwords and cookies with just a tap of the trash button. 

CREATE SHORTCUTS
Pin up to four shortcuts on your home screen. Get to your favorite site even quicker without typing anything. 

FASTER BROWSING WITH AD BLOCKING & TRACKING PROTECTION
Firefox Focus blocks many ads you‚Äôd normally see on web pages so you get much faster page load speeds, which means you get to the stuff you want a lot faster. Focus also blocks a wide range of trackers by default, including social trackers and those sticky ones that come from things like Facebook ads.

BACKED BY A NON-PROFIT
Firefox Focus is backed by Mozilla, the non-profit that fights for your rights on the web, so you can trust it not to sell your data.

LEARN MORE ABOUT FIREFOX WEB BROWSER:

- Read about Firefox permissions: http://mzl.la/Permissions

- Learn more about what‚Äôs up at Mozilla: https://blog.mozilla.org

ABOUT MOZILLA

Mozilla exists to build the Internet as a public resource accessible to all because we believe open and free is better than closed and controlled. We build products like Firefox to promote choice and transparency and give people more control over their lives online. Learn more at https://www.mozilla.org.

Privacy Policy: http://www.mozilla.org/legal/privacy/firefox.html

title: Focus - Userscripts & Player
description:
„ÄêVideo Mode„Äë
Customizable player supporting floating video, playback speed control, picture-in-picture, DLNA and AirPlay casting, and one-click screen lock.

„ÄêUserscripts„Äë
Supports both JavaScript and Tampermonkey 5.3.0 syntax. After years of user feedback, Focus has greatly improved compatibility with various scripts, ensuring more scripts run smoothly on Focus.

„ÄêReading Mode„Äë

Supports text filtering and regular expression rule filtering.

„ÄêAuto Page Turning„Äë
Hands-free page turning for novels, comics, or forums. Supports search engines like Baidu, Google, Bing, and Yandex. Try it out now!

„ÄêRedirect Blocker„Äë
Can block malicious app redirects within webpages.

Add your favorite websites to the homepage and set a personalized browser homepage.

Super fast translation, making it easy to understand any webpage and breaking down language barriers.

„ÄêBookmark Sync„Äë
Import bookmarks from Safari, Chrome, and Alook into Focus and export Focus bookmarks to those browsers, ensuring seamless bookmark syncing.

„ÄêURL Scheme„Äë

„ÄêOther Features„Äë
Supports iPad, iCloud bookmark sync, dark mode, incognito mode, ad marking mode, fingerprint/FaceID login, feedback, and full-screen mode.

„ÄêPrivacy & Security„Äë
Focus respects your privacy. Incognito mode doesn‚Äôt save browsing history, cache, or cookies.

title: Flora - Green Focus
description:
Flora is a new way to stay off your phone, clear to-do lists, and build positive, life-changing habits. Whenever you want to make progress towards your goals, plant a seed in Flora. As you work hard, the seed will grow into a healthy tree. Let the tree be your coach and grow yourself with it. You will be amazed by how great you can be.

FOCUS TREES

Have trouble putting down the phone? Flora blocks distracting apps in a pleasant way to help you focus on what‚Äôs more important in real life. If you cannot resist the temptation of using your phone and leave the app while growing a tree, the tree will be killed! But if succeeding, you'll unlock new trees.

DOUBLE EFFICIENCY WITH FRIENDS 

Things get even more interesting when you challenge your friends to plant trees together‚Äîyou will see who kills a tree (ouch). However, if you successfully stay away from your phones together, each of you will win an additional tree from a random friend. You can also chat and share your progress to motivate each other and keep everyone on track.*

* Flora is the original app for multi-user tree planting and delivers the best features that help you and your friends be productive. 

TO-DO LIST & WIDGET

Flora is a to-do list, and more. Simply create a to-do item and set a reminder, then you will never forget a thing. Even better, you can tag your trees with a to-do item to easily track the progress towards each of your life goals. No matter if your goal is daily, weekly, or monthly, Flora will help you follow it through and achieve it.

HABIT TRACKER

Enjoy a rewarding daily habit routine. If you grow trees regularly, you will earn yourself a beautiful, vibrant garden. Take a look at it and feel proud of yourself! Each tree records your perseverance and a step towards a healthy life. You can also view the daily, weekly, or monthly statistics of your activities in Flora to find opportunities to improve your time-management and planning skills.

REAL TREES, REAL IMPACT

Why not plant REAL trees while improving yourself? Flora proudly offers the opt-in Price and Care services that let you plant real trees on the earth if you kill or successfully grow a tree in the app. We partner with tree-planting organizations in Africa and East Asia, such as the Trees.org and Eden Reforestation Projects, to plant fast-growing soil rebuilding trees, fruit trees that diversify incomes and nutrition, and trees that can provide forage and fuel-wood. All these trees help make the earth greener and provide long-term financial aid to families who need it most.

Sounds good? Download Flora and join our 2,000,000+ productive users now!

title: Focus Keeper - Pomodoro Timer
description:
Focus Keeper is the ultimate focus timer and Pomodoro timer designed to help you boost productivity and fight against procrastination. Whether you're a student preparing for an exam, managing ADHD, or simply trying to stay focused, this app is here to make your time management easier. By leveraging the original Pomodoro method, Focus Keeper helps you break down your tasks into manageable intervals and balance work with breaks, so you can stay on track without burning out.

With a built-in study tracker, customizable settings, and an intuitive design, Focus Keeper is ideal for those who need a reliable exam timer or just want to track their progress efficiently.

Focus Keeper: Pomodoro Timer, Exam Timer, ADHD
Pomodoro ‚Äì Stay true to the original technique with 25-minute sessions followed by short breaks to keep your mind sharp.

Customizable Focus Timer ‚Äì Adjust the length of your sessions, short breaks, and long breaks to suit your workflow.

Exam Timer & Study Timer ‚Äì Ideal for students and professionals, the product acts as a perfect exam timer to help you easily manage study sessions.

ADHD Friendly ‚Äì Tailored for those with ADHD, the app‚Äôs structured technique helps improve concentration and task completion.

Time Tracker ‚Äì Track your productivity over time with insightful charts and fight against ADHD and procrastination.

Simple Interface ‚Äì With a clean and intuitive design, it's easy to set up your focus timer and start working on your tasks immediately.

How Its Works?
Set Your Focus Timer & Study Timer‚Äì Choose a task and set the clock for 25 minutes.
Work Until the Rings ‚Äì Stay focused on your task until the Pomodoro rings.
Take a Short Break ‚Äì Enjoy a 5-minute break after each session to refresh your mind.
Long Breaks ‚Äì After completing 4 focus sessions, take a longer break of 20-30 minutes to recharge.
The app automatically starts the next session, so you can stay productive without interruptions.

Who Can Benefit?
Whether you're a student needing a reliable study timer for exams, a professional managing multiple tasks, or someone who struggles with ADHD, the concentration app is the perfect tool. The app provides a structured routine, making it easier to avoid distractions and procrastination. Its built-in time tracker and customizable settings ensure that you can stay productive in any environment, from the office to the study room.

Why ?
Unlike other apps, Focus Keeper offers an original Pomodoro experience while giving you full control over how you manage your focus sessions. Whether you're using it as an exam timer, a study timer, or to manage ADHD, its versatile features and easy-to-use interface make it stand out. Track your productivity over time, customize your features, and use it as a stopwatch for specific tasks ‚Äì all while avoiding procrastination and staying on task.

Read our privacy policy at https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/36391786

title: Forest: Focus for Productivity
description:
## Top productivity app in 136 countries. More than 2 million satisfied paying users. Featured in Apple's "Amazing Apps" TV commercial.
## Staying focused with the cutest gamified timer. 
## Over 1,500,000 real trees were planted on Earth by our users.  

"Forest works well, and if your goal is to be more in the moment, ignore your phone and actually talk to your friends when you are with them, this is the app for you."‚Äî The New York Times 

"In order to establish new, better habits, it's helpful to engage with tools that make it easier to reinforce them. For anyone looking to curtail their phone usage, the Forest app might be for you."‚Äî Business Insider

If you want to temporarily put down your phone and focus on what‚Äôs more important in real life, you can plant a seed in Forest. As time goes by, this seed will gradually grow into a tree. However, if you cannot resist the temptation of using your phone and leave the app, your tree will wither. 

The sense of achievement and responsibility will encourage you to stay away from your phone, and will help you make better use of your time. Stop getting distracted by your phone, make you self-motivated and get more things done.

Stay focused, Be present! 

STAY FOCUSED
‚Ä¢ A interesting way to help you beat phone addiction and overcome distraction
‚Ä¢ Turn your focused moments into a lush forest.
‚Ä¢ Create personalized Allow Lists for different situations. Non-allowed apps will be blocked. (iOS 16 or above)

GET MOTIVATED
‚Ä¢ Earn rewards and unlock more than 90 new tree species and white noises.
‚Ä¢ Share your forest and compete with friends and users around the world.
‚Ä¢ Plant trees along with friends & family.
‚Ä¢ Unlock achievements and earn extra rewards.
‚Ä¢ Plant real trees on Earth and protect the environment with tree-planting organization Trees for the Future.

STATISTICS
‚Ä¢ Manage your own tags and view detailed statistics of your time distribution.
‚Ä¢ Browse your weekly, monthly and even your yearly big forest.
‚Ä¢ Track your focused time in the Apple Health App.
‚Ä¢ Track your daily phone usage and screen time.

It's never too late to build up productive habits! 

NOTICE
‚Ä¢ Forest is compatible with iPhone, iPad and Apple Watch, and can be used across these iOS devices with a one-time purchase. The full app with the aforementioned features is available on iPhone and iPad; on Apple Watch you can view live planting session and today‚Äôs focus stats. To download or unlock a non-iOS version, it requires a separate purchase. By logging into the same account, your data can be synchronized across all platforms.
‚Ä¢ Due to iOS limitations, the Allow List feature is only available on iOS/iPadOS 16 or above. If you‚Äôre using a device running iOS/iPadOS 15 or below, your tree will wither when you leave Forest during a planting session.
‚Ä¢ Due to budget constraint, the number of real trees each user can plant is limited to five. We will be introducing limited time events that will allow users to plant more real trees. Please follow our social media page or check the in-app announcement for more updates.
‚Ä¢ There is only one version of Forest on the App Store. Other apps that are similar and mimics Forest are not developed by the Forest team. Thank you for your support!

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/forestapp.cc/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/forestapp_cc

We also provide browser extensions. Find out more on www.forestapp.cc

title: Focos
description:
Focos is a big step into the future of computational photography and light-field camera, bringing DSLR-like photography to your iPhone and iPad Pro, with beautiful bokeh effects usually achievable only with professional large aperture cameras. With the technology of computational photography, you can make unlimited changes to your photos, focus after the fact, change the aperture repeatedly, and add multiple lights in 3D space, exceeding the limits of any editing tools you‚Äôve known before. "Focos has long been one of the most ambitious photo-editing apps on iOS, turning any photo into a 'portrait mode'-style image with fully adjustable depth of field, no matter what kind of camera you took it with."

MAIN FEATURES

- The AI engine can calculate depth of field automatically for all photos.
- True 3D imaging.
- Simulate large apertures to create real bokeh effects normally only possible with DSLR cameras and expensive lenses.
- Import all existing photos and customize the bokeh effect.
- Re-focus portrait photos that have already been taken, with a simple tap.

- Professional options to simulate lens characteristics, such as creamy, bilinear, swirly, and reflex effects, and more.
- Visualize the depth of areas within your portrait photos in a 3D view, and intuitively add depth filters.
- Add multiple lights in a 3D space, and adjust the color, brightness and so on for each light.

FEATURES

======================

FOCUS TIMER

Focus comes with a fully customizable productivity timer that supports you in working efficiently. Focus for 25 minutes, then get reminded to take a short break to relax your mind. After four sessions, take a longer, 15 to 20 minute break. This method maximizes energy, stimulates creativity, and promotes a sense of achievement.

Create unlimited tasks and track your time on each task. By working on one task at a time, you reduce distractions and can put all your attention toward completing your goals. That way you‚Äôll be perfectly organized on your path to success.

WIDGETS

Start your Focus timer right from your Lock Screen, Home Screen, or Control Center. Widgets make it easy to see your most important info at a glance, while Live Activities show your session‚Äôs progress in real time, so you‚Äôre always in the loop and never miss a break.

FOCUS ON APPLE WATCH

Using Focus on your wrist is a natural fit. The independent Apple Watch app is made for easy and lightweight interactions letting you control sessions and track your progress throughout the day. 

CLEAN DESIGN

The name says it all: Focus draws your attention to the most important things. It‚Äôs designed to be unobtrusive, accessible and easy-to-use. You‚Äôll intuitively master its collection of features in no time.

title: FocusFlight - Deepfocus Timer
description:
## Focus Timer
## App Blocker

In a world full of distractions, FocusFlight offers a unique escape, transforming the way users approach focus and productivity. Seamlessly combining the thrill of aviation with the challenge of staying focused, FocusFlight is not just an app ‚Äî it‚Äôs an experience.

## FOCUSFLIGHT FEATURES
1. Personalized FocusFlight
Book custom focus flights anytime, set your preferred focus duration and type, and embark on a productive journey with a ritualistic touch.
2. FocusFlight Mode
Activate ‚ÄúAirplane Mode‚Äù to enter a distraction-free environment. With Apple‚Äôs Screen Time integration, distracting apps are automatically blocked, helping you stay focused on what matters most.
3. Route Tags & Focus Data Tracking
Tag each focus flight with specific categories, track different types of focus sessions, and visualize your progress with detailed insights into your focus habits.
4. Diverse Focus Categories
Select different focus types through seat options, tailoring your experience for tasks like studying, working, or reading. Focusing has never been this fun and flexible!
5. Dynamic Map & Virtual Flights
Convert your focus time into completed virtual routes and unlock new cities with every session, creating a personalized flight map as you progress.
6. Thoughtful Focus Reminders
Set up custom reminders based on your habits, with gentle nudges to keep you on track and motivated to stay focused throughout the day.
7. Exclusive Focus AchievementsÔºàcoming soon...Ôºâ
Earn badges and accumulate flight miles after each focus session, boosting your motivation and providing a sense of accomplishment.

The idea for FocusFlight didn‚Äôt just come from a brainstorming session ‚Äî it came from lived experience. We are intimately familiar with the struggles of ADHD, where focus can often feel elusive, but when found, can unlock incredible productivity. As aviation enthusiasts, we knew there was something powerful in the metaphor of flight: the clarity of a journey, the excitement of the destination, and the uninterrupted time between. And so, FocusFlight was born ‚Äî a tool designed to help users navigate their focus in the same way they would a flight path, giving them control and concentration during their most important tasks.

## SUBSCRIBE TO FOCUSFLIGHT
- Subscription Plans: ‚ÄúFocusFlight All-Access Plan (Annual Auto-Renewal)‚Äù, ‚ÄúFocusFlight All-Access Plan (Monthly Auto-Renewal)‚Äù;
- Subscription Type: Auto-renewable subscription;

title: Exocus | Painless Focus
description:
Is Pain-Free Focus Difficult?

Exocus is a unique focus timer app. Here, your focus is no longer boring, repetitive, or meaningless because every moment of your focus will transform your very own planet.

Do you struggle with staying motivated when you commit to doing something valuable in the long run, like learning new words, practicing an instrument, working out, or mastering a new language? Initially, you're full of enthusiasm, but soon, your passion wanes. Memorizing words becomes a chore, the instrument is neglected, workouts turn into a burden, and progress in the new language stalls...
You start doubting yourself: ‚ÄúMaybe I just don‚Äôt have what it takes to stick with long-term commitments.‚Äù

That‚Äôs not true! Let us explain the real reasons.

‚óè Lack of Immediate Rewards:
You understand the long-term value of these tasks, but how much does this half-hour of focus matter right now?

‚óè Repetition Leads to Boredom:
When the initial novelty wears off, the repetitive nature of the task can make you feel bored and tired.

‚óè Overly Negative Focus: 
Focusing on what you haven't accomplished rather than acknowledging what you have done can lead to negative self-evaluation and loss of motivation.

Let Exocus Help You!


====== Exocus Solutions ======

Exocus is a gamified focus timer that visualizes your concentration as a planet's evolution, helping you achieve long-term, pain-free focus.

‚óè Emotional Design and Sense of Meaning
After each focus session, you‚Äôll see the story of what happened to your planet during that time. Even five minutes of focus equals 38.53 million years of evolution for your planet, so your focus is crucial. Want to raise the stakes? You can enable ‚ÄúHardcore Mode,‚Äù where failing to focus might cause your planet to be destroyed!

‚óè Stage-Based Incentives
Short-term Incentives: After each focus session, the planet‚Äôs landscape changes and tells you its story.
Medium-term Incentives: After several hours of focus, the planet undergoes more significant transformations, like forming magma, oceans, and land.
Long-term Incentives: After around ten hours of focus, the planet completes its evolution. You can then add it to your star system, with each project corresponding to a star system, showcasing your long-term accumulation in that project.

‚óè Continuous Freshness
We offer hundreds of unique planet designs, satisfying your curiosity and desire to collect with constant surprises. See a planet's full appearance only after evolving it through focused efforts. Earn Stardust coins by focusing to unlock new planet seeds, motivating continuous concentration.


====== What Makes Exocus Special? ======

‚óè Meticulously Crafted Design
Exocus uses a unique pixel art style, maintaining simplicity while incorporating delightful little Easter eggs for you to discover. We believe the beauty of Exocus can bring joy, which will ultimately translate into more focused time.

‚óè Fun Game Elements
Exocus embraces gamified design in a bold yet restrained and professional manner. We hope the game elements help you enjoy focusing, and we also care deeply about your ability to truly focus. We‚Äôve eliminated anything that could distract you because we genuinely want to focus on achieving long-term goals with you.

‚óè Flexible Focus Modes
Exocus supports countdown timers, stopwatch mode, and the Pomodoro technique. In the Pomodoro technique, you can flexibly set focus and break durations and specify longer breaks after several focus cycles.

‚óè Convenient Project Management
Each project corresponds to a planet. You can track different categories of focus time with projects and quickly switch between projects on the home screen by swiping left or right.

‚óè Personalized Statistics
Based on your focus data, we provide personalized charts to help you understand your focus patterns and stay motivated to maintain consistent focus.


Terms of Use: https://byland.work/exocus/terms.html
Support: exocus@byland.work

title: one sec | screen time + focus
description:
In contrast to Screen Time, one sec delays access to apps and websites instead of blocking them completely ‚Äì this is fundamentally different than any other screen time tool you‚Äôve tried before!

Have you tried a digital detox? And it did not work, because you fall back into your habits immediately?¬†

Well here is the solution:

one sec solves our unhealthy phone relationship at its roots: by making distracting apps less appealing, our brains lose interest to open them all the time without proper intention.

The effectiveness of one sec has been confirmed in a peer-reviewed scientific study with the Max-Planck Institute and Heidelberg University: app usage drops by 57% on average! Long-term!

Fight the social media algorithms and win back control over your phone usage & your subconsciousness!

‚Äúone sec‚Äù uses Shortcuts Automation to toggle a deep breath animation whenever you open one of the configured apps (Instagram, Twitter, YouTube‚Ä¶). This breaks unconcious social media habits short-term (literally, as soon as you have set it up) and even helps long-term by adding more friction when opening these apps.

Did you really want to open Instagram? Or was it just because you're bored waiting for your bus?
This app helps you to reflect your actions, thoughts, and feelings; disrupting harmful social media habits with mindfulness.

On top of that, ‚Äúone sec‚Äù also contributes your mindful moments to the Health App via HealthKit.

Especially for people with ADHD one sec is a great tool to gain back control for incredible focus and concentration.

Integrations and collabs:
- You can set up one sec to sync tasks with Structured, so you won't be able to access social media apps during ongoing unfinished tasks.
- You can set up one sec to learn a new language with LENGO, so every time you open social media, you have to answer a handful of vocabularies.

title: Focus Tomato - Let's focus now
description:
## App Of The Day - Apple
## New Apps We Love - Apple
## Try These Out - Apple
## Student App of the Month - The App Brewery (London)



Focus Tomato is a serious tomato helping you stay focused.¬†
Cheer you up when you succeed.



‚Äî‚Äî Recommended consuming order ‚Äî‚Äî

Step 1: Goal setting
If the goal is too big, break it down.

Step 2: only focus for 25 minutes
* Only focus on one thing
* Avoid distraction; make efforts to keep the Tomato running (ex. if someone hits you up, tell him/her getting back to you shortly!)
* Better to watch the timer counting

Step 3: Rest for 5 minutes
* Not suitable for mental consuming tasks
* Light activities that are good for your mind and body
* Pause your work momentarily can help you view things from another perspective and avoid couldn't see the forests for the trees.‚Ä®

Step 4: Repeat 4 times, then take a more extended rest for 15 to 30 minutes
Repeat the previous two steps for 4 times, and take a 15 to 30 minutes long rest



‚Äî‚Äî After taking it, you can gain the following benefits on top of straight As ‚Äî‚Äî‚Ä®
* Prevent distracting and stay focused more easily: counting down timer brings good stress
* Reduce interruptions: postpone other tasks; most things can wait for 25 minutes
* Avoid procrastinating: when the timer is running, it means the declaration of a focused time frame
* Endure longer: with adequate rest, you can run further‚Ä®



‚Äî‚Äî Features of ‚ÄúFocus Tomato‚Äù ‚Äî‚Äî

Based on the Pomodoro method with new spice-ups and improvements.

* Do not force stop; keep the flow
Classical Promodoro clock asks you to stop working asap when time is up; Focus Tomato only notifies you with sound and does not force you to stop. You can keep staying in the zone and running the timer.

* Fractional time is allowed
Classical Promodoro clock requires to maintain 25 minutes duration. Focus Tomato freely lets you count the fractional time as long as it starts running.

* Modifiable Timeline
It is usual to forget to stop the timer. Focus Tomato allows you to modify the Timeline and make adjustments afterward.

* Do Not Disturb mode is available
Distracted by too many notifications? Do Not Disturb mode can be enabled when Focus Tomato is running.

* Integrate smoothly with other work methods and/or apps
Because the app only applies the timing part of the Promodoro technique, in addition to the original Promodoro method, you can also use the Reminder, Trello, or physical notebooks along with it.



Good tomato, why not eat it?

title: Focus: Pomodoro Study Timer
description:
I have an exam coming up. A paper due this weekend. And honestly... I don't feel like doing anything. 
Deadlines are looming, tasks are piling up, and I just can't focus on work or study. Sounds familiar?

You're not alone. We all go through these very human moments.

 But don‚Äôt worry! There‚Äôs a simple yet powerful technique designed to help you: the Pomodoro Technique.
It helps boost your concentration, manage your study and work time, and build momentum using a timer.

 How it works:
1) Set a timer for how long you want to focus on studying or working.  
2) Take a short break when the time ends.  
3) Repeat. 

Sounds too simple? Try it ‚Äî you‚Äôll be surprised how well it works!

 This app is built on the Pomodoro Technique, refined with user feedback to help you stay on track, stay focused, and get things done.

 Key Features:

1 Customizable Pomodoro Timers  
- For work: 10, 25, 60 minutes   
- For breaks: 1, 5, 30 minutes   
- Set your own durations for maximum flexibility

2 Task Categorization and Time Management  
Track your study time and work sessions by:
- Subject: English, Math, History, Physics...  
- Work type: Emails, Meetings, Writing, etc.  
- Study method: Reading, Listening, Memorizing, Note-taking  
- Other: Programming, Drawing, Practicing, Test prep, Meditation 

3 Visual Progress Review   
Reflect on your focus patterns with helpful graphs:
- "Nice, I stayed on track today."
- "Hmm, hard to focus at home. I‚Äôll try shorter sessions tomorrow."
- "Focus is off today. A quick timer might help."

4 Focus Psychology   
Bite-sized tips and articles on:
- Preventing smartphone distractions   
- Breaking focus-killing habits  
- The science of rest and how to use it wisely

 This app is for you if you're:
- A student prepping for exams, quizzes, or assignments   
- A professional boosting productivity at work   
- A homemaker balancing house chores and personal time   
- A language learner working toward certification 

 It's a small and simple app ‚Äî just a repeating timer ‚Äî but it‚Äôs made for those who care about focus, productivity, and making each day meaningful.

We hope you‚Äôll give it a try. It just might change the way you work and study!

5) Gift your gems as a donation to help real dogs from shelters while you compete with others.
6) Level up your focus and beat phone addiction while using our Pomodoro timer.

Do you struggle with phone addiction and distractions? Our productivity app is here to help! With our Pomodoro timer, you can focus on your important tasks while building healthy habits. The app's donut machine allows you to produce donuts for your virtual dog, Focus, who needs to be fed regularly. 

But beware of distractions! If you leave the app, your donut machine will stop. The sense of achievement and responsibility for Focus will motivate you to stay away from your phone and get more things done. Your progress is displayed with detailed statistics that help with time management and reduce screen time.

Focus Dog is heavily gamified, making it motivating and competitive. You can customize the app to unlock new donut recipes and upgrade your donut machine, as well as level up and compete with friends. The design is super cute and packed with a ton of details to keep you engaged.

Our app is perfect for those who need to stay focused in various settings, such as in the office, at school, during meditation, or at bedtime. Don't just take our word for it - users love our app! One satisfied customer said, "This productivity/game app is something truly unique. It helps you to keep the focus on the important stuff in your life and battles your phone addiction!" Start your productivity journey with Focus Dog today.

STAY FOCUSED
‚Ä¢ Beat phone addiction and overcome distraction in a fun way!
‚Ä¢ Turn your focus time into game progress. With every moment of focus, you earn rewards and unlock new features.

GET MOTIVATED
‚Ä¢ Unlock over 120 donut recipes, machines, dog skins, and backgrounds as you progress in the game.
‚Ä¢ Share your progress and compete with friends and users around the world. 
‚Ä¢ Complete challenges and earn extra rewards to keep you motivated.
‚Ä¢ Help real dogs in need and make a difference. You can gift your gems as a donation to feed real dogs in shelters.

STATISTICS

FOCUS DOG PRO

Brainway is a productivity enhancing app that reveals how your habits and routines affect your ability to focus, perform, and achieve your goals. Brainway's data-driven methodology places you in control, providing all the tools you need to break down your habits, recognize their impact, and rebuild your lifestyle on your own terms. While the primary focus is overcoming procrastination, there is no limit to the habits and routines you can track, analyze, and optimize with Brainway.

All Your Productivity Data in One Secure Place

You can also synchronize data from any gadget or app through Google Fit and Apple Health, consolidating all your data in one place. The more data you feed into Brainway, the more accurate and personalized your productivity insights become. No more juggling multiple tracking apps - have all your data in one secure place with guaranteed privacy. Your data is visible only to you.

Brainway Is Perfect For:

Discovering what impacts your focus and productivity.
Tracking your tasks and identifying their completion patterns.
Setting reminders for tasks and evaluating their progress.
Analyzing and improving your sleep for maximum productivity.
Tracking your diet and identifying how it affects your mental performance.
Identifying productivity pitfalls and learning to avoid them.


Brainway allows you to log your productivity data quickly and simply. It is highly customizable and serves as a task tracker, focus level tracker, sleep tracker, diary/notes, daily photos, exercise and diet tracker.


Private and Secure

Your privacy is our top priority. We've taken all necessary security measures to ensure it. All data within the app is encrypted and can only be accessed by you. You have complete control and can export or delete all your data at any given time from within the app.


Subscription Pricing and Terms

$29.99 per month

title: Pomodoro Timer: Stay Focused
description:
Focus Keeper helps you keep your productivity high avoiding burnout using the timer. Work with time. Not against it!

* Featured by Product Hunt

Here is what this app offers:
‚Ä¢ Simple, beautiful and intuitive interface. 
‚Ä¢ Customize focus sessions, goals, colors and sounds. 
‚Ä¢ Track your productivity with insightful charts.
‚Ä¢ Universal(iPhone/iPad) app with iCloud support. 


Basic Focus Steps - It‚Äôs all about focusing your work efforts in timed 25-minute chunks, with a 5-minute break in between each burst of activity. 
1) Choose a task to be done.
2) Set the timer for 25 minutes.
3) Focus on the task until the timer rings 
4) Take a short break (just do something relaxing for 5 minutes)
5) Once you‚Äôve completed 4 focus sessions, take a longer break. (20~30 minutes)


Features: 
‚Ä¢ Adjust the timer with your fingers just like you do with real egg-timer.
‚Ä¢ Next session starts automatically when the current session ends.
‚Ä¢ Track your progress with two different charts (14 days and 30 days)
‚Ä¢ Set your daily goal (number of Focus Sessions per day)
‚Ä¢ Set how many Focus Sessions you want to finish before taking a long break(number of Focus per round)
‚Ä¢ Customize the length of Focus Session, short break, and long break. 
‚Ä¢ Choose your ticking from 10 different ticking sounds and your own music library.
‚Ä¢ Choose your alarm from 14 different ring sounds.
‚Ä¢ Set any sounds separately for the short break, long break, and Focus session.
‚Ä¢ Set any colors separately for the‚Äã short break, long break, and Focus session.
‚Ä¢ Receive alarm notifications even when the app is running in the background. 
‚Ä¢ Today Widget for Focus Sessions
‚Ä¢ Icon Badge shows how much time you left to finish the current session in the home screen Focus Keeper icon when the timer is ticking.
‚Ä¢ Focus Reminder: If you're struggling to make a habit of using Focus Keeper, this could come in hand. You can set when you want to be notified to use Focus Keeper through weekdays and weekends.
‚Ä¢ Option for resetting the Focus Count at midnight automatically. Now you can set your own reset time.
‚Ä¢ Set different volume sounds for each ticking and alarm sound.

title: Pomodoro Timer: Focus Booster

You can also turn this feature off for manual control whenever you prefer.

Stay organized with the built-in calendar feature. Add your tasks, plan your day, and visualize your schedule all in one place. This makes it easier to break down large projects into manageable sessions and track your progress over time.

‚Ä¢ Track Your Progress:

‚Ä¢ Why Pomodoro Timer?:
Whether you‚Äôre a student, professional, or anyone looking to improve time management, this app helps you work smarter, not harder. By structuring your work into focused intervals and regular breaks, you‚Äôll reduce burnout, improve concentration, and achieve more in less time.

title: Session Pomodoro Focus Timer
description:
- Do you procrastinate and spend your time mindlessly? 
- have problem with focusing? 
- often get distracted while trying to focus? 
- maybe you are burned out because you worked too much and forget to take necessary break?
- or, maybe have an ADHD?

Session can help you with your focus problem.

Trusted daily by tens of thousands of engineer in Silicon Valley, independent studios in Madrid, writers in Netherlands, and creative worker + freelancer all over the world.

It helps you be more productive by guiding you to work in sessions, block distractions, track your time, and remind you to rest.

GET INTO HABIT OF WORKING IN TIME BLOCK
Inspired by Pomodoro technique, Session helps you block your time for focus. 25 minutes or 45 minutes is all you need to get closer to your goal

KEEP YOUR FOCUS BY BLOCKING WEBSITES AND APPS THAT DISTRACT YOU (MAC ONLY)
Session block distracting website and apps when you started a Session. It'll automatically restore your website when you are on rest / session has ended.

BLOCK SLACK TEAM
Session will automatically mute Slack team you choose when Session has started and open them up again when Session has stopped working.

DON'T FORGET TO TAKE A REST
Forcing yourself to work on long period of time is ineffective.  Rest is as important as work / study. Why? Because rest is a crucial time where you:
- store what you have learned in your head, and where
- your brain solve difficult problem on the background.
Notice that you usually get a new idea and solves problem when you're on walk and shower. Or anywhere where you're away from "work".

AUTOMATE YOUR WORKFLOW (AUTOMATIC DO NOT DISTURB, PLAY MUSIC)

Imagine having no distracting notifications while working on. It's possible by turning on Do Not Disturb. What if you can turn it on when you started your Session, and disable it after Session ends‚Äîall automatically? Or maybe change bulb color, play Apple music when Session has started? Different playlist on break? It's possible with Session.

Automate it with AppleScript on MacOS and Apple Shortcut on iOS

SEE YOUR SESSIONS ON APPLE CALENDAR WITH ONE WAY SYNC.

See automatically create Sessions on Apple Calendar to review how your day has progressed.

REVIEW YOUR SESSIONS
Are you spending more time on a task than it's worth? Session keep you mindful by tracking your work and ask what you have learned after Session has ended.

Session tracks what you have worked on, what have you learned, and for how long. Review your progress and journey that you have made.

title: Tomato Timer €¨
description:
Pomodoro is an age-old time management and effective focus-improvement technique. Our Pomodoro Timer app brings that technique right to your iPhone/iPad.


Besides other traditional focus timer apps, our app actually includes the default pomodoro timer, but also allows you to create your own timers and customize the length of your focus session, short break, long break, etc.


It might look like a very small app, but it isn‚Äôt one, it has options to add sub-tasks, play multiple ambient sounds at once, and track all your focus sessions using our advanced statistics manager (pro-users)


Key Features
> Default Pomodoro Timer: This is a default timer created which allows people to just download the app and start the pomodoro technique based timer.


> Create Multiple Timers: Create multiple Pomodoros or timers for different tasks. So whether you want to improve focus during a workout or study time, create a timer, set focus time, short breaks, long breaks, and you‚Äôre done! Do this for all the activities which require high-quality focus time.


> Play multiple Ambient sounds at once: Currently our app has recordings of 15 different natural sounds, you can pick multiple For instance, you can play forest, thunderstorm, and bonfire. According to research, music of the right choice can boost focus by 30%.


> Add Sub-Tasks: There‚Äôs always a micro-task under your main task which you forget, that‚Äôs why we‚Äôve added the ‚Äúadd sub-tasks‚Äù functionality. Basically, you can add sub-tasks for your main tasks and mark them as done on the go.


> Advanced Statistics: Do you want to calculate the time you‚Äôve spent focusing on different tasks? How much is your break time, how many hours of focus did you take on a given day, what was the ‚ÄúCategory‚Äù which requires more of your focus time, etc.? Well, this app is what you need.


What is the Pomodoro Technique?

It‚Äôs an old technique that helps people to stay focused, boost productivity. How does it work?
1. Choose a task
2. Set a 25-minute timer and work on it.
3. Take a 5 minute ‚Äúshort‚Äù break after 25 minutes of focus.
4. Take a long break after you‚Äôve completed 4 focus sessions.
It might look like a very basic technique, people who‚Äôve implemented this technique in their lives noticed an improvement in their focus by 20-45%. What are you waiting for? Install the app now.

Privacy Policy: https://pomodoro-timer.appstraw.com/privacy-policy

Terms of Use: https://pomodoro-timer.appstraw.com/terms-conditions

description:

Focused Work is a powerful timer that helps you focus and be productive.

It's purpose-built for people who want to focus for long periods and struggle with this.

Add structure to your day with "Focus Sessions" that encourage you to complete goals, tasks, and help you divide your time into Focus, Break, and Prepare stages.

Pick from a selection of templates, including a simple timer, Pomodoro - inspired by the Pomodoro Technique, Flowmodoro - inspired by the Flowtime Technique, and other various sessions.

You can also create repeatable sessions specifically tailored to your needs. Add stages, set time limits, and much more.

Ultimately, Focused Work helps you be more accountable by reminding you to focus, reflect, and build healthy productivity habits by completing various daily goals.


**Core Features**

¬∑ A simple, powerful timer that keeps you on-task

title: Milki - Pomodoro Study Timer
description:
Study timer with custom targets that will end your procrastination forever! Pomodoro time tracking with targets is your answer to getting more done. How much does it suck pulling an all nighter because you left your study to the last minute. Or the disappointment of your side project losing momentum.

With Milki, you can set variable daily targets for each activity and track against them over a defined period e.g. 2 weeks or 2 months. The Actual vs. Target (worm) chart is incredibly powerful at keeping you on track, you can visually track your performance over the period. No other focus timer app does this, so I had to create one that did haha. 

Milki also uses the Pomodoro productivity hack of 25 minute intervals. With the combination of the Pomodoro technique & Actual vs. Target tracking, you will be shocked at the improvement for your study, work or side projects.

STATUS LEVELS

The Pomodoro technique is a time management method that suggests working in 25-minute intervals, without interruptions or distractions, and adding 5-minute breaks. Their goal is to set goals and improve productivity.

Pomodoro Focus Timer Plus is a simple tool/process to improve productivity (yours or your team members) to do the following:

       Relieves anxiety related to the start
       Increase concentration and focus by reducing interruptions.
       It makes you more aware of your decisions.
       Increase your motivation and keep it constant
       Strengthen your determination to achieve your goals
       Refine the estimation process, both in qualitative and quantitative terms.
       Improve your work or study process
       Strengthen your determination to continue applying yourself to complex situations.

This application does not require registration and is completely free.

title: Clock
description:
Clock helps you manage your time on iOS, iPadOS and macOS. Check the current time anywhere with World Clock, make sure you wake up on time with Alarms, or keep track of passing time with Stopwatch and Timers.

World Clock
Check the current time in cities around the world. Or quickly see the time difference compared to your local time to make coordinating across time zones easy.

Alarms
Set regular alarms for any time of day. Choose to set them to repeat on specific days, give them a label and select the sound that plays with each. When your alarm goes off, you can choose to play from a selection of sounds, or pick a song from your Apple Music library.

You can also adjust your wake up alarm and sleep schedule from Health right in the Clock app so you can wind down with a Sleep Focus and make sure you always wake up on time.

Stopwatch
Measure the duration of an event. You can see how much time has lapsed with either a digital or analog stopwatch face, and you can quickly record laps or splits throughout the time.

Timers
Count down seconds, minutes or hours. Or count down using multiple timers, and add labels and distinct sounds to each. You can also choose to set a timer that stops any music playing in the background‚Äîperfect for getting to sleep with your favorite playlist.

title: Visual Countdown Timer
description:
Is it a battle to get your child to do something quickly?

This visual countdown App was designed for my 2 year old son to help him get his reward chart star for getting dressed quickly.
Getting him dressed used to take forever with many stalling strategies being deployed. Now he runs upstairs asking for the "Countdown".

Watch as the timer runs from green to amber to red, helping the child understand that time is running out.

A fun picture is slowly revealed as the time runs down and when the time is up the child is rewarded with an exciting sound and the picture spins.

Background image changes to match the time of day, so that your child is given subtle hints as to what time of day the task they are being asked relates to.

Choose your own image to reveal from your iPhones photo library to really surprise your child.

Endless possible uses:
* Getting dressed
* Getting out the door (shoes and coats on)
* Tidying
* Brushing teeth
* Sharing toys

Turns daily struggles into fun time!

description:
The PushPress Timer is the cleanest, easiest, most amazeballingest Timer out there.  Built with high intensity workouts in mind, this timer handles almost every workout you can think of:  AMRAP's, Count Up, Count Down, EMOM's, Tabata's and more!

Get Motivated!
Some of the most famous names in the world of Funcational Fitness are waiting to count you down.  We've got Aja Barto, Carl Paoli, Coach Burgener, Diane Fu, Elyse Umeda, and Jamie Hagiya are ready to light the fire under your a**.  We‚Äôve already recorded audio of some other hot commodities in the community - and we‚Äôre recording more audio all the time!   Expect frequent updates with more of the top athletes and coaches joining the mix!   

It‚Äôs So Simple
We‚Äôve taken a fresh approach to the typical timer, and made one that‚Äôs clean, crisp and clear.  We know you probably have sweat (or blood) in your eye, and reading a clock that‚Äôs not well laid out might be a nightmare.  The PushPress Timer has a big, bold display, highly contrasting colors and very easy to understand-at-a-glance interface.  Stop wasting time trying to tell how far into a workout you are, and keep on moving that weight!

Gym Clock
Pair this app with your TV (using an Apple TV) and WHAM! You got yourself an instant massive, kick a** clock for your gym to use for workouts.  Forget that old analog beeping clock from the 1980‚Äôs - put up a big ol‚Äô TV in your gym and run this clock off of it.  Use that TV when you‚Äôre not running a class to show YouTube videos of Klokov snatching mad weight‚Ä¶ or use it to show Barney re-runs to the kids.  Either way, it‚Äôs a massive upgrade to your space, something your clients will appreciate.

** Even though we really really love us some functional fitness (and own a couple boxes ourselves), The PushPress Timer is not affiliated with CrossFit, Inc., The CrossFit Games, or any other property owned by CrossFit, Inc.  CrossFit is a registered trademark of CrossFit, Inc. **
