title: Timer - Minimal Timer
description:
Meet Minimal Timer, your perfect companion for all your timing needs. This easy-to-use timer app helps you stay focused and manage your time well, whether you're working, studying, cooking, or just need a gentle reminder. We've designed it to be simple and helpful, so you can do more with less fuss.

Set Timers with Ease:
With Minimal Timer, setting a timer is straightforward and quick. You can easily set your desired duration in minutes or hours using the clear, easy-to-use keypad interface. Simply type in the time you need, and you're ready to go. If you often use the same times, you'll also love our selection of handy presets that get you started quickly. Or, if you need something specific, you can customize your own timers to fit any activity. Minimal Timer is built to be flexible for your everyday life.

Custom Presets:
Create and save your own frequently used timer durations. Whether it's for a 25-minute focus session, a 7-minute workout, or a 30-minute cooking reminder, you can set it once and use it again and again with just a tap. This makes starting your favorite timers super quick and easy.

Custom Alarm Volume:
Adjust your alarm sound to be just right for any situation. Whether you need a loud reminder to get your attention or a quiet chime that won't disturb others, you're in control. This means your timer will always alert you exactly how you want it to.

Ambient Ticking Sound:
If you like to feel time passing, you can turn on an optional, gentle ticking sound. This subtle feature can help you stay aware of the duration and maintain your focus, creating a calm and productive environment without being distracting.

Widgets:
Keep an eye on your timers right from your home screen. Our handy widgets let you see your active timers at a glance, so you're always updated on your progress without needing to open the app. It's a convenient way to stay on track throughout your day.

Subscription & Cancellation:
Enjoy flexible subscription options for premium features. Your payment is charged to your Apple account when you confirm your purchase, and subscriptions renew automatically unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the current period ends. If you start with a free trial, it will switch to a paid subscription unless canceled before the trial is over. You can easily manage or cancel your subscription anytime through your Apple account settings.

Ready to make managing your time a breeze? Minimal Timer is designed for everyone, with a clean look and straightforward features that just work. Give it a try today and enjoy the convenience of a reliable and simple timer tool!

title: GymNext Flex Timer
description:
Say hello to the future of interval training timers!

The GymNext Flex Timer is the world's first interval training timer app that also controls a wall mounted LED display.  It's great for interval training workouts like CrossFit, HIIT, Bootcamps, Intensity, MMA, boxing, and many others.

While traditional wall-mounted LED timers provide a great, easy to see display, they are plagued by difficult to use remotes that are easily broken or lost.  Alternatively, smartphone timer apps provide a much simpler, more powerful approach to control and setup, but the in-app display is difficult to see from around the gym.  

Enter the Flex Timer - the best of both worlds!  Combining a highly visible LED display that can be seen from all over your gym with the most advanced, easiest to use interval timer app available.  You're going to love it!

Check out these great features:
* use the app standalone without an LED display or combine it with our Home or Gym Edition timers and you'll never squint to see the time remaining again
* nine highly customizable timer modes including Standard, Round, Interval, Tabata, EMOM, and Laps/Stopwatch.  With Multi-Segment, Shot Clock & Beep Test virtually any workout you can think of is covered
* save your favorite workouts with names, descriptions and custom thumbnails for instant recall in the future
* go hands-free with the Apple Watch to control the timer from your wrist
* audio sync means your music's volume will be controlled in sync with the apps built-in audio indicators and the LED displays electric buzzer ensuring you can play the music you love at the volume you want without missing a mark
* hook up multiple bluetooth heart rate monitors and you can track your heart rate or your classes as you workout
* setup custom zones to let you know whether your heart rate is too low or too high
* connect to multiple clocks around your gym and simultaneously control all of them or hook up to them individually and run separate classes
* run multiple different timers allowing your class to perform different workouts at the same time
* with bluetooth control, you can now start, stop and pause your timer from acute angles and around corners - no more line of sight restrictions

title: Study Time Record
description:
This is an app that allows you to record study time and check the history with pie charts and stacked bar graphs.

- Counting study time
The app counts.
Select a subject, set the study time, and count to record study time.
If you close the app or perform other operations while studying, the count will be interrupted.

- Register subjects
By registering subjects, you can record which subjects you studied.
By recording each subject, you can understand which subjects you do not have enough study time.

- Study history
Displays daily study time in a stacked bar graph.
Recheck your study time by looking at your past history.
If you do not have enough study time, make sure to set aside time for studying.

- Advertisement
This app is free to use, but ads are displayed.
To avoid interrupting your studies, ads are displayed only after the countdown is completed so as not to break your concentration.

- Purpose of this app
This app was created for children who tend to study only in the subjects they are good at.
The study time for subjects you are weak at tends to be short. By visualizing the time you study, you can understand the lack of study time for subjects you are weak at. I hope this will lead to improved grades for everyone.

description:

[FULL SLEEP ANALYSIS]

You can now track daily steps, distance, walking time, flights climbed, and walking heart rate‚Äîall with a 14-day trend overview.
Our approach doesn‚Äôt push you to chase step goals. Instead, it helps you understand your daily movement patterns‚Äîideal for everyday walkers and those managing chronic conditions.

[SYNC ACTIVITIES WITH YOUR CYCLE]
Know daily stress tolerance of each menstrual cycle phase and receive support for your current state, with workout suggestions like "Flow Workouts" along with allowing you to take a pause when your period starts.

‚ñ∂STAYING ACTIVE ON YOUR TERMS‚óÄ
[STREAK & STATUS]
Keep your streak alive by following your body‚Äôs needs, even when it calls for rest days. When life happens‚Äîbe it illness, injury, or vacation‚Äîadjust your status to reflect real life and skip feeling guilty.

[AWARD-WINNING APPLE WATCH WORKOUT TRACKER]
Track real-time training effects and heart rate zones to manage your workout intensity and avoid overtraining. Get a countdown to ‚Äúoverreaching‚Äù to know exactly when you're close to pushing too hard for the day.

[PERSONALIZED WORKOUT TRACKING]
Track 140+ activities, from chores to a variety of workouts, with detailed maps and metric charts, and stay within your healthy activity levels.

[TAILORED DAILY WORKOUTS]
Get daily suggestions‚Äîranging from rest to high-intensity exercises‚Äîbased on your readiness. Go Gentler's on-watch suggestions allow you to scale your exercise duration and/or intensity up or down.

‚ñ∂ULTIMATE WORKOUT JOURNAL‚óÄ

Turn your workout summaries into a personalized fitness journal. Customize them with details that matter to you: rename workouts, add notes, photos, and mark your favorite sessions. Plus, adjust the effort using the RPE chart when needed.

[PROGRESS CHARTS]
Your progress with weekly, monthly and yearly charts, including a monthly and yearly recap.

[LIVE ACTIVITY & WIDGETS]
Use Live Activity for tracking on iPhone, and interactive widgets on your Home & Lock screens.

[ACCESSIBLE TO ALL]
Full support for accessibility preferences including bold text, dynamic type, reduced transparency, increased contrast, motion adjustments, and voiceover.

Your health data stays on-device via Apple HealthKit, with no external processing.

title: HabitBoard - Habit Tracker
description:
HabitBoard is a simple and flexible habit tracker. It helps you to form and keep track of your intentional habits, provides valuable insights for your decisions, and offers support in staying attentive.

### Personal Habits
If you're just starting out with one or two habits or already have a long list of things you want to keep track of ‚Äî HabitBoard imposes no limitations on the types of habits you can track. The Free version allows for tracking of 3 habits, Pro supports unlimited habits.

### Historic Data
It provides a detailed calendar-like view of your historic data which grows over time. In addition, you get habit-specific statistics like current and longest streaks, completion rate, and count by week, month, and year.

### Statistics
HabitBoard provides meaningful and beautiful stats that give an overview over all your tracked habits. You can inspect your overall weekly and monthly completions, get an overall completion rate, and keep track of your daily completions. Available with HabitBoard Pro.

### Weekly Goals and Skipped Days
Some habits are not planned daily and HabitBoard makes it easy to configure automatically skipped days and weekly goals per habit. If you set a weekly goal, you'll see an additional label for the current progress in the habit list.

### Notes
You can add notes to individual days and review them for each habit. This can come handy to, e.g., remember why you marked a day as skipped, to keep track of when you start a new book with your reading habit, or take note when you start a new progression in your exercise habit.

### Customizable Colors
Each habit can use colors according to your personal taste or for visual grouping of habits. You can customize both the colors for done and missed habit states. Available with HabitBoard Pro.

### Widgets
HabitBoard offers Lock Screen widgets, a daily completions widget, and small, medium, and a large calendar-like widgets (which are interactive on iOS 17) so that you can glance on your habits even if you're not using the app.

### Shortcuts
With the ‚ÄúMark habit as done‚Äù and ‚ÄúSet note for habit‚Äù Shortcuts actions, you can combine different tasks to automatically keep your HabitBoard up-to-date.

### Archived Habits
Some things also come to an end (or are paused), so HabitBoard offers a dedicated place for archived habits. Habits that live there are still fully interactive, so it can also be used as a more private area for certain habits. Available with HabitBoard Pro.

### Configuration of List Labels
Streaks are not always the most meaningful metric ‚Äî sometimes it's better to focus more on completions. With HabitBoard, you can decide whether you want to display the current streak, weekly, monthly, and yearly completions in addition to the names in the habit list.

### Reminders
When you‚Äôre starting out, a daily reminder can be useful. If you want, the app notifies you when it‚Äôs time to review your HabitBoard for the day.
In addition, with HabitBoard Pro, each habit can have its own reminders. You can choose the time and weekdays where you want to be reminded, customize the notification message, and decide whether to be reminded if you already marked the habit for the day. And you can have multiple reminders per habit.

### Automatic Backup and Sync
HabitBoard securely and privately backups and syncs your habits via iCloud. If you're using a second device, your data is already there.

### Support for Apple Watch
If you‚Äôre using an Apple Watch, you can track your daily habits from your wrist. The dedicated watch app allows for marking habits directly (which is synced with the paired iPhone) and provides various complications for your watch face to display daily progress.

---

If you have feedback, a bug report, or want to be a beta tester, feel free to reach out via any of the links under *Settings ‚Üí About*.

Thanks for using HabitBoard!

---

Terms of Service: https://habitboard.app/terms/
Privacy Policy: https://habitboard.app/privacy/

Atoms is the definitive habits forming app inspired by the groundbreaking principles of Atomic Habits, the best-selling book by James Clear. ACTIVITIES

Take advantage of reminders and scheduling features. Additionally, set specific locations to receive automatic reminders for arrivals or departures.

WATCH APP

title: (Not Boring) Habits
description:
**APPLE DESIGN AWARD WINNER 2022**

SCIENCE-BACKED METHOD TO BUILD BETTER HABITS
Most habit trackers fail. They try to motivate you with games like streaks and trophies only to turn on you when you fall off. Building habits doesn‚Äôt have to be miserable.

60 REPETITIONS
Studies show that a new behavior needs to be repeated 60 times for it to stick. It doesn‚Äôt matter if you miss a day or break a streak. It just matters that you do it 60 times. Great habit builders learn to ignore the goal and falling in love with the journey.

WE‚ÄôRE YOUR GUIDE
Every day we will help you take another step and guide you along your journey to reach 60 repetitions until you‚Äôve mastered your new habit.

NO GUILT. NO STREAKS. NO PHONY REWARDS.
If you miss a day or two, we don‚Äôt guilt you.

JUST GOOD FUN VIBES.
Every step forward is progress. 

WHAT SMALL THING YOU COULD YOU DO TO IMPROVE YOUR LIFE?
Works for any habit: meditate, walk, stretch, floss, read, journal, draw, keep in touch with family, or less time on screens.

WIDGETS & REMINDERS TO STAY MOTIVATED

title: Avocation - Habit Tracker

Customize habit colors, icons, and routines. Need a reminder? That's not a problem, you can schedule an individual notification for each habit. All set up? Don't worry, your statistics is safe. With out time travel feature you can return one day back and make sure all completed habits are marked.

title: Habit-Bull: Daily Goal Planner
description:
HabitBull helps you organize your life! 

Easily keep track of all your habits, routines and repeated to-dos!

¬ª Smash Through Your Goals!
HabitBull is a powerful companion which helps you keep track of your day to day habits and routines

¬ª Fully Customizable
Measure and track anything and everything. Get notified whenever you need to do something important.

¬ª Cut Bad Habits From Your Life
Simply start tracking bad habits like nail biting, smoking or drinking too much. Once you see the patterns, it's easier to break them. HabitBull keeps you accountable.

¬ª Add Some Positive Habits
Want to go for a nice walk every day? Or maybe give 3 hugs every Saturday and Sunday? Join us!

¬ª Who is it for?
Whether you want to read some more, stop smoking, start working out or even just track how many hours you wasted on Facebook, this app lets you do it! 

¬ª HabitBull only speaks English at the moment!


¬ª Features
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Track multiple habits, repeated to do's or goals, each in its own calendar
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Streak counter and percentage successful for each habit
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Yes/No or Number goals
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Very flexible goals like: number of times per day/week/month, only on certain days of the week etc. For example: 30 push ups every Mon-Fri, go to the gym 2 times per week, or even every 2 days
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Inspiring quotes per category - including actual quotes from people doing it (meditation, reading, stop drinking alcohol, stop smoking cigarettes, stop procrastination etc)
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Graphs with success percentage / streak, entered values etc
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Powerful reminders - multiple times per day, sound and vibrate optional
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Multi-device syncing
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Cloud backup
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Discussion Forums
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Pin Lock

¬ª How it works:
1. Set up a habit
2. Tell HabitBull how you went for a day
3. Watch your daily streak increase

Habits are no more than routines which you perform subconsciously. To build one - train yourself. To break one, find another one which is similar, yet different and nicer, and repeat it until it sticks.

To assist you with this HabitBull lets you set reminders for each habit and displays them on days when you need to be successful. This is especially useful if you have a to do list with repeating tasks or if you want to be reminded to do the same thing every day. It can also be used as a calendar planning tool or checklist, but also as a very effective repeating reminder (e.g. to drink water every 2 hours).

HabitBull does feel a little like a game in which you compete with yourself. The task is to get a long streak for the habit you are working on by covering your goals. The longer the better. It takes a couple of months to fully build a new routine, so don't give up - it takes time and if you are consistent it will work; even if it takes a few attempts.

Daylio enables you to keep a private journal without having to type a single line. Try this beautifully designed & stunningly simple micro-diary app right now for FREE!


** WHAT IS DAYLIO **

Daylio is a very versatile app, and you can turn it in whatever you need to track. Your fitness goal pal. Your mental health coach. Your food log. Your gratitude diary. Mood tracker. Exercise, meditate, eat, and be grateful. Take care of your mental, emotional, and physical health. Good self-care is a key to improved mood and reduced anxiety.

1.) Reach happiness and self-improvement by being mindful of your days.
2.) Validate your hunches. How does your new hobby influence your life?

For anxiety and stress relief, make sure to include activities that help you to cope with negativity. Everybody can use a mood boost! You can measure their impact on your mood in stats. 


** HOW DOES IT WORK **

Pick your mood and add activities you have been doing during the day. You can also add notes and keep an old school diary. Daylio is collecting recorded moods and activities in the statistics and calendar. This format will help you to understand your habits better. Keep track of your activities and create patterns to become more productive!

You can review all entries in the statistics on charts or the calendar and share them with your friends.

To make it even better, Daylio allows you:
- Make reflection a daily habit

- Safely back up and restore your entries via your private Google Drive
- Set reminders and never forget to create a memory

- Export PDF and CSV documents to share or print your entries


** PRIVACY AND SECURITY **

We are a top private journal since we do not store or collect your data.

At Daylio, we believe in transparency and honesty. Your data is stored locally on your phone. You can optionally schedule backups to your private cloud storage or take your backup file with you anywhere. Data are entirely under your control at all times.

Data stored in the app's private directories are not accessible by any other apps or processes. Your backups are transferred to the iCloud Drive via the secure (encrypted) channels.

Journaling has never been easier!

title: ScreenZen- Screen Time Control
description:
Multiple strategies to reduce your screentime

1. Delay before opening your app: A bit of time before choosing if you need to open your distracting app. You can have the wait time increase each time you open your app.

2. Interrupt your scrolling: Check your distracting apps for short periods of time so you don't get sucked in.

3. Set an app goal and optionally block when you reach your limit.

4. Configurable for different days of the week and time by app.

5. Messages like "Is this important" before opening your app.

6. See your screen time for only your distracting apps. Don't worry about Google Maps bloating up your time.

7. Strict block your apps: Either for time ranges, after a certain number of opens or ScreenTime. Strict blocked apps can be hidden from the home screen.

8. Locks on Settings to prevent you from changing your settings when you want to open an app.

9. Breathing and other activities to encourage you not to need to open the app while waiting for it to unlock.

10. Streaks to encourage you not to exceed your limits or override your settings.

title: 1Blocker - Adblock
description:
1Blocker lets you block obtrusive ads, sneaky trackers, and annoying elements on sites. With 1Blocker, you‚Äôre safe online and nothing will distract you from enjoying sites.

1Blocker is very easy to use ‚Äî just flip a couple of switches to start blocking ads and trackers. The app will automatically receive cloud updates to the built-in filters silently, so you don‚Äôt need to do anything. It‚Äôs as simple as setting and forgetting.

1Blocker is a fully native app designed to extend Safari naturally. It‚Äôs lightweight and doesn‚Äôt drain your battery by taking up your device‚Äôs resources.

The blocking itself is super fast because Safari does it itself. We only provide filters to Safari and don‚Äôt modify webpages in any way. This vastly improves efficiency because Safari knows in advance what should be blocked. So, with 1Blocker, sites load on average 2-5x faster.

It‚Äôs important to note that not all ads can be blocked though. Some sites use techniques that make it impossible for us to block their ads using currently available features for Safari content blockers.

SECURE BY DESIGN

1Blocker is secure and private. It doesn‚Äôt have access to webpages and doesn‚Äôt track you in any way.

We believe that privacy is not for sale. That's why we don't have an "Acceptable Ads" program. We stay independent, and the only way we make money is through direct sales of 1Blocker in the App Store to you.

ADVANCED CUSTOMIZATION

1Blocker is a highly customizable content blocker, providing the possibility to create powerful custom rules. It allows you to create custom rules that block any URL by providing a regular expression or hide any element by CSS. It also lets you block cookies. (Available in Premium)

AVAILABLE ON ALL DEVICES

1Blocker is available for iPhone, iPad, and Mac. Your preferences and custom rules are always in sync through iCloud no matter which device you're using.

FEATURED IN THE PRESS

1Blocker has been featured in TechCrunch, Lifehacker, MacStories, Macworld, and many more.

FEATURES AVAILABLE FOR FREE

‚Ä¢ The ability to enable one category (for example, Block Ads only)
‚Ä¢ Whitelisting sites right from the Safari extension
‚Ä¢ Whitelist synchronization between devices via iCloud

FRIENDLY SUPPORT

Send your feedback at @1BlockerApp on Twitter or via email. Your feedback is always very welcome and considered for the next release.


We have been making 1Blocker since 2015. We believe it‚Äôs the best all-around package currently available in the App Store.

BlockP is a highly effective porn blocker. It can help you quit porn or successfully complete the no fap challenge. It can also block sites that you wish to be blocked. In addition, it has many other features like community, resources etc. which all help in rewiring your brain away from porn addiction.


It's also a great tool to protect you from all kinds of distractions.


Features:


PORN BLOCKER: There are so many websites that have adult content in them, which makes it much easier for you to come across. But BlockP will block them altogether.


We have built up a database that has over 2 million different adult websites. Try to open up any of them, and they‚Äôre going to be blocked in a blink.


ACCOUNTABILITY PARTNER: Quitting an addiction could be difficult to do alone. To help with this, you can add a buddy who can help you on this journey. Once you add an accountability partner, he/she can help and keep you accountable to your goals.


COMMUNITY: BlockP has an active community of people who share a similar behaviour. You can talk to such peers to get support and encouragement on your journey. This also helps you stay motivated and share each other's experiences.


WEBSITE BLOCKER: This functionality provides you access to block specific websites on your iPhone. You can enter the domain name of the website to be blocked, and it will be automatically blocked in your phone.


CURATED CONTENT: Do you want to know more about porn addiction and how to overcome it?


Don‚Äôt worry, we have experts who write about such topics like: How to deal with urges, what is the meaning of Fapless challenge, what is No PMO etc. This section not only provides knowledge on the addiction, but also provides practical tips that help on a day-to-day basis.


PANIC SWITCH: Dealing with urges to watch adult content is very hard. Also, will power be always reliable. This is where the panic switch can help. Once you enable the panic switch, all internet on your device will be blocked for a few minutes (you can choose the duration).


UNINSTALL NOTIFICATION: It helps you in avoiding relapses. Whenever you uninstall the BlockP from your device, we send a notification to your accountability partner stating that you have uninstalled the BlockP app.


DAILY REPORT: We send daily reports to your accountability partner. It helps your accountability partner to have track about internet browsing activity.


VPN NOTIFICATION: Whenever you turn off the VPN we send a notification to your accountability partner stating that you have turned off the vpn. It‚Äôs an extra layer of protection for you to keep yourself away from adult content.

STREAK COUNTER: Count your streak and know your progress on your NoNutNovember and quiet porn and adult content.





Device Permissions from You: To have BlockP block all kinds of pornography on your iPhone, you‚Äôll need to give the app permission to set up an VPN profile.


SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION

All the features require a active premium in-order to access them. The application is free to download but require a active premium to access all features in the app.


Consider BlockP PREMIUM and enjoy full access to all features and content. If you choose a BlockP PREMIUM subscription, payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.


The subscription will automatically renew unless turned off in your iTunes Account Settings at least 24 hours before the current period ends. From iTunes Account settings you can manage your subscription and turn off auto-renew. Your iTunes Account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed.

Privacy Policy - https://blockp.in/privacy-policy/

We love your feedback. Contact support@blockp.in

title: AdBlock
developer: AdBlock Labs Sp. z o. o.
description:
The original AdBlock - the first and last ad-blocker you'll ever need. A one time purchase - no subscriptions needed. We've been blocking ads on iPhones and iPads since 2012 - we know our game! :) 
AdBlock allows you to block ads on your iOS device. Get rid of 99% of annoying popups, banners and video ads. Protect your privacy, limit bandwidth use, speed up your device, save battery and drastically improve your day-to-day iOS experience.

The most important advantages of AdBlock are:
‚Ä¢ AdBlock comes with a local DNS proxy service built-in. Use it to see which domains you're device is contacting. Create your own rules and assign any IP to any domain, right on your device. You can (and should!) bootstrap this feature with rules found online.
‚Ä¢ AdBlock has enhanced DNS proxy rules export and import function. Share DNS proxy rules with other users, easily import rules found on the Internet.
‚Ä¢ AdBlock comes with a Safari Content Blocker to block ads on websites in Safari.
‚Ä¢ AdBlock allows you to create your own list of domains and synchronize your rules between all your devices using iCloud.
‚Ä¢ AdBlock allows you to protect your privacy by blocking mobile trackers. Prevent Internet trackers from recording your online activity and selling your private data.
‚Ä¢ AdBlock does not send your Internet traffic through any remote server. All of your connections stay direct, fast and secure. Ads are blocked right on your device!
‚Ä¢ Setting up AdBlock is simple! Just download the app, and follow the tutorial to set everything up. When in doubt - contact our support!
‚Ä¢ AdBlock automatically updates to the latest version of the filters on every app run. We keep the ad servers database up-to-date for you.
‚Ä¢ AdBlock works with Wi-Fi and cellular networks. You don't need to set it up separately for every network you use.
‚Ä¢ AdBlock comes with a handy widget to quickly change the DNS proxy status when needed.

Looking for support? Contact our dedicated support line directly from the app - we'll help you out with the proper setup and answer all the questions you might have.

title: uBlock Origin Lite
description:
uBO Lite (uBOL) is a reliable and efficient content blocker.

The default ruleset corresponds to uBlock Origin's default filterset:

- uBlock Origin's built-in filter lists
- EasyList
- EasyPrivacy
- Peter Lowe‚Äôs Ad and tracking server list

You can enable more rulesets by visiting the options page -- click the _Cogs_ icon in the popup panel.

uBOL is entirely declarative, meaning there is no need for a permanent uBOL process for the filtering to occur, and CSS/JS injection-based content filtering is performed reliably by the browser itself rather than by the extension. This means that uBOL itself does not consume CPU/memory resources while content blocking is ongoing -- uBOL's service worker process is required _only_ when you interact with the popup panel or the option pages.

"Focus Mode" is a revolutionary app specifically designed to improve your focus, manage your time efficiently, and control your screen time. As the ultimate app blocker, it empowers you to block apps and sites causing distraction, thereby transforming your phone screen into a focus keeper.

Time management is the cornerstone of productivity, and "Focus Mode" understands it all too well. With time blocking capabilities, this app facilitates a disciplined regime where you decide your app time limit. Get rid of all the distractions, stay focused, and use the study timer to keep track of your progress.

Worried about your child's screen time? This parental control app for iPhone comes with an innovative child lock app feature. Monitor your kids' phone usage, limit screen time, and ensure they remain focused on their studies. The parents' control feature, coupled with a child screen lock, makes "Focus Mode" a reliable kids lock app.

"Focus Mode" is not just about blocking apps, but it also offers a robust website blocker, blocking any site that you deem unnecessary. Be it ads, inappropriate content, or social media, our site blocker got you covered.

The app blocker free feature allows you to establish self-control over your digital life. The screen time control aids in fighting off procrastination, making you more productive. Track your screen time with the screen time tracker, set your app limit, and maintain a healthy balance between work and relaxation.

Our app's social media blocker feature enables you to curb your digital consumption, providing you with offtime that you can utilize for other essential tasks. With "Focus Mode," you can beat the addiction to your phone screen and enhance your productivity.

"Focus Mode" also includes a pornblocker app feature, which ensures a safe and controlled digital environment for all users. Stay in charge, avoid distractions, manage your time, and enjoy a focused life with "Focus Mode."

Your path to self-control, productivity, and a distraction-free life starts here. Download "Focus Mode" today and take the first step towards a more focused and productive life.

Privacy Policy: https://blakitech.com/privacy_policy_focus_mode_app
Terms of Use: https://blakitech.com/terms_of_use_focus_mode_app

title: DuckDuckGo Browser, Search, AI
description:
At DuckDuckGo, we believe the best way to protect your personal information from hackers, scammers, and privacy-invasive companies is to stop it from being collected at all. That's why millions of people choose DuckDuckGo over Chrome and other browsers to search and browse online. Our built-in search engine is like Google but never tracks your searches. Our browsing protections, such as ad tracker blocking and cookie blocking, help stop other companies from collecting your data. While our optional integrated AI features, Search Assist and Duck.ai, are private and never use your data to train AI. Oh, and our browser is free ‚Äî we make money from privacy-respecting search ads, not by exploiting your data. Take back control of your personal information with the browser designed for data protection, not data collection.  

FEATURE HIGHLIGHTS 
Protect Your Searches by Default: DuckDuckGo Search comes built-in, so you can easily search online without being tracked.‚ÄØ 

Shield Your Browsing History: Our 3rd-Party Tracker Loading Protection blocks most trackers before they load, greatly exceeding what most popular browsers offer by default.‚ÄØ 

Chat Privately with AI: Duck.ai lets you have private conversations with 3rd-party AI models, anonymized by us and never used to train AI. 

Secure Your Email (Optional): Use Email Protection to block most email trackers and hide your existing email address with @duck.com addresses. ‚ÄØ 

Watch YouTube Videos Without Targeted Ads:‚ÄØDuck Player protects you from targeted ads and cookies with a distraction-free interface that incorporates YouTube‚Äôs strictest privacy settings for embedded video. 

Automatically Enforce Encryption: Shield your data from network and Wi-Fi snoopers by forcing many sites to use an HTTPS connection.‚ÄØ 

Escape Fingerprinting: Make it harder for companies to create a unique identifier for you by blocking‚ÄØattempts to combine info about your browser and device.‚ÄØ 

Sync and Back Up Securely (Optional): Sync encrypted bookmarks and passwords across your devices. 

Clear your tabs and browsing data in a flash with the Fire Button. 

Banish cookie pop-ups and automatically set your preferences to minimize cookies and maximize privacy. 

And many more protections not available on most browsers, even in private browsing mode, including protection from link tracking, Global Privacy Control (GPC), and more. 

DUCKDUCKGO SUBSCRIPTION
Subscribers get

‚Ä¢	Our VPN: Secure your connection on up to 5 devices.‚ÄØ‚ÄØ‚ÄØ‚ÄØ 

‚Ä¢ 	Access to advanced AI models in Duck.ai: Chat privately with AI models built for complex tasks. 

‚Ä¢	Personal Information Removal: Find and remove personal info from sites that store and sell it (access on desktop).‚ÄØ‚ÄØ 

‚Ä¢	Identity Theft Restoration: If your identity is stolen, we‚Äôll help restore it.‚ÄØ‚ÄØ 

DuckDuckGo Subscription Pricing & Terms‚ÄØ‚ÄØ 
Payment will be charged automatically to your Apple Account until you cancel, which you can do in app settings. You have the option to provide an email address to activate your subscription on other devices, and we will only use that email address to verify your subscription. For terms of service and privacy policy, visit‚ÄØhttps://duckduckgo.com/pro/privacy-terms 

Read more about our free Tracking Protections at‚ÄØhttps://help.duckduckgo.com/privacy/web-tracking-protections 

Privacy Policy:‚ÄØhttps://duckduckgo.com/privacy/‚ÄØ 

Terms of Service:‚ÄØhttps://duckduckgo.com/terms 

Note about 3rd-Party Tracker Protection and Search Ads: while there are some limitations following search ad clicks, viewing ads on DuckDuckGo search is anonymous. Learn more here https://help.duckduckgo.com/privacy/web-tracking-protections

title: AdGuard  ‚Äî adblock&privacy
description:
AdGuard is an ultra-efficient ad blocker for Safari. It will not only remove annoying ads but also secure your privacy with advanced tracking protection. AdGuard for iOS is an open source app, it‚Äôs totally transparent and safe to use. The app is free but offers additional paid Premium features for advanced users.

KEY FEATURES:

- Safari ad blocking. Removes all kinds of ads in Safari. Say goodbye to annoying banners, pop-ups and video ads. Whitelist your favorite websites or use manual blocking tool to hide any element on the page.

- Privacy protection. The web is full of trackers that literally watch your every click. AdGuard offers a selection of filters aimed directly at trackers and web analytics that will ensure your private data stays that way.

- Speed acceleration. Safari browser runs up to 4x faster. AdGuard removes tons of rubbish and you can freely surf the web!

- Reduced traffic consumption and increased battery life. Banners and ads sometimes add up to half the size of the page. By blocking them, you‚Äôre saving your battery life and Wi-Fi/mobile traffic.

- More than 50 popular subscriptions (EasyList, EasyPrivacy, etc.) plus AdGuard's own powerful ad filters, including language-specific filters. Together they don't leave ads a chance.

ADGUARD PREMIUM

- Custom filters. Add your own filters by URL even if they are not on the default list.

- DNS privacy. Blocking regular online trackers is not enough if you want to assure 100% protection of your online privacy. Choose any of the user-favorite DNS providers or configure a custom DNS server.

- Security filters. Protect yourself from dangerous websites riddled with cryptojacking or fraud.

AdGuard Premium is a paid service with the subscription cost $0.99/month or $4.99/year or a one-time purchase of lifetime subscription $12.99 (prices may vary by region). Your subscriptions may be managed and your auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchasing a subscription.

title: Hush Nag Blocker
description:
Browse the web like it should be ‚Äì free of nags to accept cookies or privacy invasive tracking. It's tiny, fast, free, open, secure and without any access to your data.

‚ÄúI‚Äôd recommend Hush to anyone who uses Safari‚Äù
‚Äî John Gruber, Daring Fireball

SECURE AND PRIVATE

Hush doesn't have any third party dependencies, behavioral tracking nor crash reporting ‚Äì no data is collected and nothing leaves your device. 

The blocking is done by Safari itself with instructions from Hush, so the app has no access to your browser habits nor does it want to. Don't take our word for it ‚Äì we play with open cards and publish the source code for anyone to inspect. 

SIMPLE YET POWERFUL

Using Hush is as easy as installing it and enabling it in Settings -> Apps -> Safari -> Extensions. No settings, no maintenance ‚Äì just thousands of rules doing the hard work for you in the background. 

It works like magic ‚Äì you will not notice Hush until you disable it. 

MODERN, TINY AND FAST

The app is primarily a host of rules that integrates with Safari in a native lightweight way, making the blocking efficient, fast and easy on your disk space.

FREE AND OPEN

Hush is both free of charge and Open Source with a permissive MIT license. No in-app purchases, no nonsense. 

AVAILABLE ON ALL DEVICES

Hush is available for iPhone, iPad, and Mac.

title: Brick - Ditch Distractions
description:
Brick was created because we believe that life is better when phones help us do more of what matters, instead of constantly distracting us with things that don't. As two young guys, we were raised on smartphones - so we decided to make something to help us use them the way they were meant to be used.

Brick is a combination of software and NFC-powered hardware that temporarily removes distracting apps (and their notifications) from your phone - leaving only the powerful tools you choose.

With Brick, simply open the app and tap your device to block all distracting apps and notifications. Until you return to the device, you'll be free to engage with what really matters - whether that be getting productive work done, spending time with friends and family, or simply going for a walk. Once you're ready to reconnect, just tap the device again to unblock everything.

The Brick app allows you to:
- customize the apps you want to leave unblocked while Bricked
- track your usage history to see your improvement as you spend more time undistracted
- contact the creators to give input for feature requests and any necessary improvements / fixes

title: World Clock Master: Time Zones
description:
THE EASIEST WAY TO DEAL WITH MULTIPLE TIMEZONES + INTERACTIVE WIDGETS
Sick of screwing up meeting times and missing calls? This app cuts through time-zone confusion and hands you the perfect hour at a glance.
Forget guesswork ‚Äî just click, connect, and impress.

KEY FEATURES

EVENT SCHEDULING MADE EASY
Found the perfect meeting time? Add events to your calendar with just a tap, and never miss an international webinar, call, or special moment again.

ATOMIC ACCURACY
No drift, no guesswork. Each second syncs with the atomic standard, so you can trust every moment. Extensive Time Zone Database: Tap into over 160,000 locations and time zones including GMT, UTC, and more.

UNIFIED CLOCK FACE
View all your essential time zones at a glance on one beautifully designed, customizable clock face. Whether you prefer digital or analog displays (or even military time), everything is exactly where you need it.

INTERACTIVE TIME CONVERSION
Convert times instantly by simply twisting or swiping across the clock face. Watch as your selected time zones update in real time‚Äîmaking planning international calls, meetings, or travel effortless.

DYNAMIC WIDGETS
Access global times without even opening the app. Our interactive home screen widget lets you drag a simple line to reveal and convert times, ensuring you‚Äôre always in sync no matter where you are.

LIST MODE
Get a clean, text-based view of all your cities in one column. See times and dates at a glance, and scroll to check future or past hours. It‚Äôs a no-fuss way to track the world‚Äôs clocks.


FEELS LIKE A LUXURY TIMEPIECE

title: SocialFocus: Hide Distractions
description:
Hide distractions on websites such as YouTube, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Reddit, LinkedIn, Gmail and take back control of your attention!

While we acknowledge the distracting and engrossing nature of these sites, completely blocking them is not always feasible due to the valuable content they offer.

This Safari extension allows you to selectively hide attention-grabbing components on each site. For instance, on YouTube, you have the option to conceal recommended videos, shorts, comments, and more. Similarly, on Facebook and Instagram, you can hide the feed, reels, stories, and other elements. The same goes for each supported site.

Furthermore, SocialFocus offers an array of supplementary features, including Startup Settings, Import / Export and more.

Users who want to support the development of the project can additionally subscribe to the PRO version. The PRO version will give access to some additional features that are not available in the standard version, such as hotkey configuration, settings synchronization and some others. 

NOTE: This extension does NOT work with the apps, it works only for websites while using the Safari browser.

Terms Of Use: https://socialfocus.app/tos/

- Customize your app restrictions to your unique needs and schedule.

title: touch grass - beat brain rot
description:
you wanted to quickly check your notifications before bed‚Ä¶ now it‚Äôs hours later and you‚Äôre watching conspiracy theories about the moon landing. you had your chance. you blew it. boomers telling you to put your phone down didn‚Äôt work either. so, we made an app to put your phone down for you.¬†¬†

touch grass harnesses the magic of brain rot to help you reclaim your sleep, inner-peace, and focus. here‚Äôs how it works:
1)  select situations where you want to limit distracting apps (ex. limit instagram and tiktok before bed)
2)¬† set breaks to use distracting apps during those situations* (ex. two 5-minute breaks and one 10-minute break‚Ä¶ or try no breaks and begin the path to enlightenment)
3)¬† when the block is active, you‚Äôll see our homemade, brain rot-inspired memes‚Äì unless you take a break*
4)¬† use your breaks to scroll guilt-free! touch grass will not let you end your block early or add more breaks. you‚Äôll never need willpower to stay off distracting apps again
5)  start a one-time block with ease whenever you need to touch grass on the fly*
6)¬† schedule vacations from blocks for when you‚Äôre out of your routine and life demands unlimited scrolling*

touch grass is perfect if...
- you want to limit your screen time without thinking about limiting your screentime
- you‚Äôd rather save your willpower for more important things than resisting the urge to not watch another carpet being power-cleaned¬†
- you thought apple's screen time settings could fix you (we‚Äôre not like those other apps)

touch grass is not for you if‚Ä¶
- you want to rely on your willpower to avoid excessive doomscrolling 24/7/365
- you live to please our almighty tech overlords (and whoever invented snapchat)

popular ways to improve your life with touch grass:
- better sleep: block late-night doomscrolling and reclaim an hour (or three) of actual sleep. good sleep is the #1 indicator of long-term health and having even a shard of free will.
- peaceful mornings: start your day without algorithmically-engineered chaos. you deserve mornings without war footage, a burger with way too much cheese, or 5 signs your partner is fork-lift certified.
- more vacation homes for your shareholders:¬† it‚Äôs not all about you! don‚Äôt forget that by setting a workday block, you are massively increasing your productivity, which helps the president of your company finally buy that fifth beach home they so desperately deserve.


we know this isn't that deep. screens aren't evil, and we're definitely not your therapist. but if you‚Äôre tired of big tech‚Äôs armies of super-nerds stealing your attention, touch grass makes it impossible to lose. just a warning, you‚Äôre still going to see memes designed to kill brain cells.

now put down your phone and touch some grass‚Ä¶ but download the app first.

*using the app blocking features and creating vacations requires a subscription.

title: Focus - Control Screen Time
description:
Focus is an app designed to create truly focused moments for you. It's perfect for those who can't help but open their phones, even when there are tasks to be done - a solution for your smartphone addiction.

Leveraging the Screen Time feature, Focus can assist you when you need concentration for obtaining certifications, test studies, or work. Additionally, it's a valuable tool for those looking to combat smartphone addiction and improve sleep quality.

‚ñ† Focus safeguards your time with the following features:
„Éª Focus uses the Screen Time API. This API ensures no unauthorized data access. Please grant permission with peace of mind.
„Éª It operates based on the apps and times you set for restrictions. For instance, you can set it to prevent SNS usage between 9:00-17:00 during work or study hours. Even granting permissions as short as 10 minutes is possible.
„Éª If you exceed the time limit and continue to use the app, a "shield" screen appears, preventing further use.
„Éª Outside the restriction hours (e.g., after 17:00), the shield is deactivated, and the restricted apps become accessible again.
„Éª You can set multiple restrictions, tailored to your lifestyle.
„Éª There's a Pomodoro timer feature that leverages the app restriction function. This helps you study or work more efficiently.
„Éª It's also possible to make the shield non-deactivatable from the premium plan, ensuring you always adhere to the limits.

Focus is recommended for:

Those addicted to SNS, often checking it during work hours. With Focus, you can set it so SNS apps are off-limits from 9:00 - 17:00.
People who use their phones before sleeping. You can set all apps to be unusable after 22:00.
If you start your morning dawdling on entertainment or gaming apps and miss a productive start. For instance, restrict such apps from 8:00 - 10:00.
Music lovers who get lost in their tunes during study breaks. You can set music apps to be usable only for 20 minutes during study hours.
Those who quickly deactivate restrictions from the settings app. With Focus, you can set an undisable shield, ensuring you always adhere to the restrictions.
It's also a reliable partner for those who want to concentrate on tasks using the Pomodoro timer.
Please utilize this app to overcome temptations from other captivating apps.

For inquiries or feedback, please contact us at: awesome.digitaldetox.app@gmail.com

title: Screen Time Control: Inscreen
description:
Inscreen is more than a screen time tracker. Inscreen helps you pause and reflect on your screen time at regular intervals throughout the day. Designed for simplicity and privacy, Inscreen has minimal features and a zero learning curve, helping you get started quickly.

‚èµ HOW IS INSCREEN DIFFERENT?

Unlike other screen time apps that completely block access, Inscreen draws on Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT) to help you recognize your screen time habits through regular prompts and inculcate healthier behaviours without restrictions.

‚èµ WHY IT WORKS?

We tap into a few key psychological principles and behavioural patterns. Here‚Äôs why it works:
- Awareness = Better Choices: Regular reminders to ask whether you're on your phone intentionally, encouraging healthier choices.
- Guiding, not controlling: Instead of strict limits, scheduled subtle nudges to guide you toward mindful decisions, without the frustration of restrictions.
- Accountability: Weekly progress, actionable insights and daily notifications leading to lasting behaviour changes.
- Low barrier to entry: No drastic changes or restrictions, making it easy to integrate into daily life and gradually adjust over time.

‚èµ FEATURES

- Alerts to be intentional about your screen time.
- Focus sessions to completely block distracting apps for a set routine, say, during work or winding down at night.
- Strict daily limits to keep your screen time in control.
- Notifications that help you track your daily activity.
- Secure and private. All your data stays on your device.

‚èµ HOW DOES THE SETUP WORK?

title: Google Family Link
description:
Google Family Link is a parental controls app that helps you keep your family safer online. Every family‚Äôs relationship with technology is unique, so we built tools for you to choose the right balance for your family, and help them create healthy digital habits. You can use the app to see how your child is spending time on their device, see their device location, manage privacy settings, and more.


With Family Link, you can:

Establish digital ground rules
‚Ä¢ Set screen time limits ‚Äî Find the screen time that works best for your child. Family Link lets you set daily time limits, with school time and downtime schedules for their devices, so you can help your child find a healthy balance.
‚Ä¢ Manage your child‚Äôs apps ‚Äî Give your child the flexibility they need when it comes to app usage. Set individual app time limits, and unlimited time for educational or regularly used apps. You can block apps, too.

Manage content filters and security & privacy
‚Ä¢ Manage what they see online ‚Äî Set up parental controls on Google services like Chrome, Play, YouTube, and Search. Family Link allows you to block inappropriate sites, require approval for new apps, manage permissions for apps and websites, and more.
‚Ä¢ Secure their account ‚Äî Family Link gives you access to manage your child‚Äôs account and data settings. As a parent, you can help change or reset your child‚Äôs password if they forget it, edit their personal information or even delete their account if you feel necessary.*

*Children over the applicable age can manage their own account.

Stay connected on the go
‚Ä¢ See where they are ‚Äî It‚Äôs helpful to be able to find your family when they‚Äôre on the go. With Family Link, you can locate your children on one map, as long as they‚Äôre carrying their device.
‚Ä¢ Get notifications and alerts ‚Äî Family Link delivers critical notifications including when your child arrives or leaves a certain location.  You can also ring devices and view the device‚Äôs remaining battery life.


Important Information

‚Ä¢ Family Link‚Äôs tools vary depending on your child‚Äôs device. See a list of compatible devices at https://families.google/familylink/device-compatibility/
‚Ä¢ While Family Link helps you manage your child‚Äôs purchases and downloads from Google Play, they will not need approval to install app updates (including updates that expand permissions), apps you have previously approved, or apps that have been shared in Family Library. In addition, purchase approvals will apply only when your child makes a purchase through Google Play‚Äôs billing system and will not apply to purchases made through alternate billing systems. Parents should regularly review their child‚Äôs installed apps and app permissions in Family Link.
‚Ä¢ You should carefully review the apps on your child‚Äôs supervised device and disable those you don‚Äôt want them to use. Note that you may not be able to disable some pre-installed apps such as Play, Google, etc.
‚Ä¢ To see the location of your child or teen‚Äôs device, the device must be powered on, recently active, and connected to the internet through data or wifi.
‚Ä¢ Family Link parental controls are only available for supervised Google accounts. With supervised Google Accounts, children get access to Google products like Search, Chrome, and Gmail, and parents can set up basic digital ground rules to supervise them.
‚Ä¢ While Family Link provides tools to manage your child‚Äôs online experience and keep them safer online, it does not make the internet safe. Family Link can not determine the content on the internet, but it can give parents the opportunity to make decisions about how their child spends time on their device, and determine what path to online safety looks best for your family.

title: MMGuardian Parent App

- Track your child's phone location in real-time.

- Lock or unlock your child's phone remotely.

- Buzz the child phone even when it is on mute

- WhatsApp

[non-iphone child phone only]:
- Facebook Messenger

Get alerts if a chat contains signs of sexting, cyberbullying, grooming, or dangerous behavior.

---

### Detailed Reports:
- Full reports of text messages, call logs, app usage, and web activity.
- Understand your child's phone habits with easy-to-read summaries.

---

### Why MMGuardian Parental Control App:
MMGuardian allows parents to:
- Monitor kids phone activity and ensure their safety online.
- Limit screen time and reduce excessive phone use.
- Protect against cyberbullying, grooming, and inappropriate content.
- Track phone location with GPS tracker and family locator.
- Control everything remotely from your phone.
- Enjoy a reliable family link alternative with customizable options.

---

### Free 14-Day Trial:
Use all premium features FREE for 14 days. After the trial, continue protecting your child by subscribing:
- $4.99/month or $49.99/year for one child phone.
- Family plans available for up to 5 child devices.

---

### Setup Notes:
- Both parent and child phones must use the same email address.
- Both devices need network data for communication.
- Compatible with  iPhone or non-iPhone child phones.

---

We encourage parents to openly discuss using a **parental control app** with their children. Explain how it helps protect them from risks such as screen time addiction, cyberbullying, sexting, and online predators, while teaching responsible digital behavior.

Easily locate family members, friends, or devices with pinpoint accuracy using cutting-edge GPS technology. The intuitive interface displays real-time locations on an interactive map, keeping you informed of your loved ones' whereabouts at all times.

The app's live tracking feature allows real-time location sharing, perfect for coordinating meetups or ensuring someone's safe arrival. With temporary sharing options, you maintain control over your privacy while staying connected when it matters most.

Expand beyond phone tracking with support for various smart devices and tags. Locate misplaced items, pets, or vehicles, creating a comprehensive network of trackable assets for your household.

Robust parental controls offer additional security for families with younger members. Monitor device usage, set digital boundaries, and ensure your children's online safety, all from within the app.

The innovative number search feature allows you to locate registered devices using just a phone number, making it easier to reconnect with friends or family in crowded areas.

Prioritizing user privacy, the app puts you in complete control of your data. Choose who can view your location and for how long, with easy-to-use privacy settings.

title: Kidbalance: Parental Control
description:
KidBalance is a family-oriented app designed to foster a harmonious parent-child relationship through engaging and educational interactive schedules. The app leverages scientifically-backed methods that resonate with children, encouraging them to independently create and follow through on task plans, complete learning assignments, participate in physical activities, and help with household chores. Simultaneously, it offers automated management of electronic devices (such as screen locking, eye protection) and internet usage (including online time, duration, and app management). By promoting children's self-management, KidBalance frees parents from constant oversight, allowing them to act as rule-setters and referees, thus reducing potential parent-child conflicts.

Key Features:

-Scheduled Screen Lock:Set a timer to lock screens between specified hours (e.g., 9 PM to 10 AM) to prevent late-night screen use, ensuring children maintain a healthy sleep schedule and avoid excessive screen time.
  
- Kid‚Äôs Eyecare Mode: Allows parents to enable eye protection rules, such as a 5-minute break every 30 minutes, to reduce the risk of eye strain from prolonged screen use.

- App Management: Parents can quickly set up a blacklist of apps to block inappropriate content, ensuring a safer online experience for children.

- Internet Usage Management: Manage daily internet usage times and durations, helping children develop healthy online habits.

- Temporary Screen Lock: Remotely lock the screen with a single click when needed.

- One-Click Internet Cut-off:Remotely disconnect the internet to control online activity instantly.

- Schedule Management: Support children in creating their own schedules and managing their time effectively. Completing tasks earns them entertainment time as a reward.

- Parent-Child Interaction: The parent app syncs with the child app's schedule, allowing parents to engage in daily communication about tasks and schedules, enhancing the parent-child relationship.

- Role Switching: A single device can be linked to multiple users. Parents can switch between different children's schedules and set unique management strategies for each child. They can also switch to parent mode, where the device remains unrestricted.

- Growth Records: Preserve precious memories of children completing their tasks, daily interactions with parents, and earning smiley faces for excellent behavior, all recorded in the child's growth log.

title: Parental Controls by Ohana
description:
A parental control app designed for parents!

We all secretly know it. Studies show that too much screen time for children can have many negative effects. We help parents and families get a grip on the issue of kids and phones.

AUTOMATIC TIME LIMITS
Now your child is shown the ‚Äú5 more minutes please‚Äù beforehand. With a suggested or custom daily time limit, you can teach your child time management while maintaining a healthy screen time balance.

AUTOMATICALLY A SAFE INTERNET
Over 5 million websites are automatically filtered for you. As soon as your child tries to access an inappropriate site, we redirect them to a safe site and notify you. Ohana also adjusts search engines to only display child-friendly content.

LOCKED, STUDY or LEISURE
These are our modes that you can set the phone to with just one tap. Apps are then automatically locked and tidying up the room becomes the most important thing after all.

PHONE OFF FOR BEDTIME
Automatic schedules help to put the phone into locked or study mode at certain times. Apps that are not allowed can simply no longer be opened. This way, a restful night is automatically integrated into everyday life.

NEW INSIGHTS EVERY WEEK
You get a brief overview of what happened last week and can easily find out about new apps. Comparison values with other kids help you to evaluate your child.

WORKS BETWEEN ALL DEVICES
Ohana transcends device boundaries and supports different platforms. As a parent on a different platform, you can still control and enjoy all functions independently.

LOCATION SAFETY FEATURE
Some parents want an extra layer of protection in real life. Therefore, we offer a safety feature that allows parents and children to transparently share their location within the family. The function is optional to prevent any potential misuse.

SECURITY & PRIVACY
The security and privacy of parents and children are most important to us. We do not sell your data to third parties. Your data belongs to you and is securely encrypted.

TRY IT OUT FOR FREE
Download the app now and help your child manage their own devices!

For any questions, contact us at support@tryohana.com.

---

title: SafeKiddo Parental Control
description:
Child safety and parental protection are a priority for Safekiddo. We help parents protect children from threats such as: access to pornography and other dangerous content, Internet addiction.
Our product is: a mobile application that allows you to monitor the child's activity by pairing the child's devices with the parent's device.

Application functionalities:
‚Ä¢ Applications blocking - restricting access to the application.
The parent has a preview of the applications available on the child's device and determines which are allowed (safe) and which are not.
‚Ä¢ Internet blocking - restricting access to websites.
‚Ä¢ Time limit in front of the phone/computer/tablet - limiting the time spent by the child using applications and websites.
After the set time is exceeded, the child will not be able to open the application or website.
‚Ä¢ Child locator - geolocation and geofencing.
The parent has a view of the current location of the child and can set limits within which the child can safely move.
‚Ä¢ Youtube blocking - the guardian can see the list of content viewed by the child.
‚Ä¢ SOS button - the child can start alerting the parent when he finds himself in an emergency.
‚Ä¢ Sound level (vibration, sound on) and battery level.
Parents may be informed in specific time intervals about the state of sounds on the child's device and the level of its battery.

How does SafeKiddo work?
The guardian and the child install the same application on their devices. The guardian sets up his account in the application and then logs in to it on the child's device (or the child independently pairs with it using the QR code).

The application has got free trail period for the first 14 days.

title: Havenly Parental Control
description:
Havenly lets you:

- Block websites and in-app content everywhere on the device‚ÄîTikTok clips inside Instagram, YouTube links in Safari, you name it

- Set daily screen-time limits that reset automatically
- Schedule downtime for homework, bedtime, or family time
- Pre-block risky apps before they‚Äôre ever installed
- Get instant alerts when a blocked site or app is opened
- Lock settings behind a parent-only passcode


Total protection without the hassle:

Kids are tech-savvy: if YouTube is gone from Safari, they‚Äôll find it through Instagram. Havenly stops those work-arounds by filtering at the device level, so harmful content stays blocked everywhere‚Äîno matter which app tries to serve it.

Why parents choose Havenly:
- Zero accounts, zero logins ‚Äì Pair devices with a quick QR code and start managing in seconds.
- Remote management ‚Äì Edit rules from anywhere; changes reach the child‚Äôs device almost instantly.
- Granular schedules ‚Äì Create one-off, daily, or weekly rules tailored to each child‚Äôs routine.
- Privacy first ‚Äì Data is processed on-device whenever possible and never sold to third parties.


How it works:
1- Install Havenly on your device and your child‚Äôs.
2- Choose what to block, limit, or schedule. Havenly enforces it automatically.
3- Scan the on-screen QR code to remotely control your child's device ‚Äîno usernames or authentication needed.



No more app-hopping work-arounds, late-night scrolling, or constant nagging. Just peace of mind for you and healthier digital habits for them.

Download Havenly today and take back control of screen time‚Äîstraight from your own phone.

title: KidsNanny - Parental Control

title: Impulse - Brain Training
ADHD Test (Adult)
description:
Do you find it hard to concentrate? Do you feel the need to move constantly or interrupt others? If these issues are negatively impacting your daily life, this could be a sign of ADHD (Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder). While ADHD symptoms typically begin in childhood, ADHD can continue through adolescence and adulthood.

This ADHD Test is designed to help you screen yourself for the possibility of ADHD with eighteen simple questions. This app uses the Adult ADHD Self-Report Scale.

title: Clarity: CBT Self Help Journal
description:

Learn what affects your mood, develop healthier thought patterns, problem solve with the AI chatbot, practice effective coping skills, build resilience, and foster personal growth.

HOW IT WORKS
CBT is a proven method that's been rigorously studied and widely endorsed in the world of mental health. Its core principle is simple yet powerful: by understanding and changing your thoughts, you can better manage your emotions and actions. 

Clarity also integrates other effective therapy models like Dialectical Behavior Therapy (DBT), Acceptance and Commitment Therapy (ACT), Positive Psychology, and Mindfulness to bring you the best self-care tools offered by modern science.

REFRAME YOUR THOUGHTS
- Use CBT techniques to break free from negative thought cycles.
- Identify and confront Cognitive Distortions hindering your mental well-being.
- Systematically challenge and transform your thought processes for the better.

AI-INFUSED JOURNALING & CHAT
- Step into the future of mental health with innovative AI features.  
- Journal with AI-driven questions and analysis that adapt to your mental state.
- Feel heard with a thoughtful and compassionate AI Chatbot trained in CBT. 

CHECK IN FOR INSIGHTS & REWARDS
- Seamlessly track your moods, emotions, and activities.
- Derive actionable insights by examining patterns and trends.
- Earn fresh badges each month and track your progress with widgets.

DISCOVER YOURSELF
- Engage with thoughtfully crafted Guided Journals to deepen self-awareness.
- Take standardized mental health assessments, such as ADHD, Depression, and Anxiety tests. 
- Explore your authentic self with science-backed personality tests and more. 

CURATED WELLNESS LIBRARY
- Level up your knowledge with educational mental health programs.
- Reduce stress with mindfulness meditation audios, soundscapes, and breathwork.
- Find joy and calm with daily therapeutic tips and positive affirmations.  

TESTIMONIALS
"This app has saved my life."

"It feels like I have a therapist in my pocket."

"I have never recommended any app more than this one. I‚Äôm almost positive after using this app you will feel better and less stressed than before you got it!"

I‚Äôve never felt better after starting to use Clarity, and I genuinely don‚Äôt think I would‚Äôve been able to get here on my own."

DESIGNED WITH PURPOSE
We believe in increasing access to mental health care by sharing knowledge and self-help techniques that one might only learn about in a therapist‚Äôs office. Clarity was created with care by a team with backgrounds in clinical psychology and mental health research.

title: Inflow - Manage your ADHD
description:
Inflow is designed by people with ADHD, for people with ADHD. We‚Äôre not a glorified Pomodoro timer or calendar. We‚Äôre a science-based digital program, here to help you manage your ADHD/ADD.

Do you struggle with focus? Organization? Procrastination? What about attention, hyperactivity, and anxiety? Is your calendar, planner, habit tracker, or timer still not helping you organize or get things done? Is your to-do list just not cutting it?

Your ADHD/ADD diagnosis doesn‚Äôt have to hold you back. Inflow can help.

Inflow is based on the principles of Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), proven to be effective in the management of ADHD/ADD (Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder).

Many people see ADHD/ADD as just a deficit or disorder. But the key to thriving with ADHD starts with understanding and embracing your unique ADHD brain.

Start focusing, meet your goals, kick the distraction habit, and start creating a daily structure that works for you. Spend less time planning to be productive, and more time getting things done.

Improve your skills in these areas:

- Focus and Concentration
- Attention and Hyperactivity
- Goal Setting and Consistency

- Distraction Reduction
- Cyber Addiction
- Creating a Routine
- Sticking to a Schedule
- Organization
- Time Management
- Impulsivity
- Depression and Anxiety
- Procrastination
- Medication and Treatment Options
- Mindfulness
- Nutrition

...all without an ad in sight.

Inflow provides the tools you need to focus on strategies in your everyday life. We help you build a daily routine habit by habit, a day at a time.

It‚Äôs time to tackle your to-do list with ease, whether that‚Äôs studying for an exam, organizing your home more effectively, improving your focus, or simply scheduling more time for self-care. Concentrate on what matters most and organize your daily life.

Inflow also sets you up for success with:

- Daily activities and visual reminders integrated easily into your daily life
- Daily focus feature so you can prioritize more effectively
- A stigma-free and supportive ADHD/ADD community to motivate you
- Coworking sessions 

Whatever your goals may be ‚Äî stronger organization skills, building a more effective to-do list, preventing procrastination, improving attention, reducing hyperactive traits, focusing on others, or simply coping with an ADHD/ADD diagnosis ‚Äî Inflow can help.

ADHD/ADD can be challenging, but that doesn‚Äôt mean accessing support should be! If you‚Äôre tired of the day-to-day stress of managing ADHD/ADD, we‚Äôre here for you.

You don‚Äôt need to have a formal diagnosis or evaluation to use Inflow!

Reminder: While we are an ADHD/ADD app first and foremost, we cover numerous executive function skills, which can be applicable to autism (ASD), OCD, depression, dyslexia, dyspraxia, and more.

Questions or feedback? Shoot us an email! hello@getinflow.io

title: How We Feel
developer: The How We Feel Project, Inc.
description:
How We Feel is a free app created by scientists, designers, engineers, and therapists to help people better understand their emotions and find strategies to help them navigate their emotions in the moment. Conceived in conjunction with Yale University's Center for Emotional Intelligence and based on the work of Dr Marc Brackett, How We Feel helps people find the right word to describe how they feel while tracking their sleep, exercise, and health trends using HealthKit in order to spot patterns over time.

Founded as a science-based nonprofit, How We Feel is made possible by donations from people who are passionate about bringing mental wellbeing to the widest possible audience. Our data privacy terms are clear and easy-to-understand: all of your data is kept on your device unless you opt-in to send an anonymized version of your check-ins to be used in research to help more people.

Whether you are downloading this app in order to build better relationships, make your emotions to work for you, not against you, improve how you handle stress and anxiety or simply to feel better, How We Feel will help you identify patterns through daily HealthKit tracking and find emotional regulation strategies that will work for you. The How We Feel friends feature allows you to share how you feel with the people you trust most in real time, strengthening your most important relationships.

Filled with step-by-step video strategies you can do in as little as one minute on themes like "Change Your Thinking" to help you address negative thought patterns with cognitive strategies; "Move Your Body" to express and release emotions through movement strategies;"Be Mindful" to gain perspective and minimize the negative impact of misunderstood emotions with mindfulness strategies; "Reach Out" to build intimacy and trust, two important tools for emotional wellbeing, with social strategies.

title: neurolist: AI Planner for ADHD
description:
neurolist is an AI-based to-do list that helps neurodivergent folks reach their potential.

First, you enter a scary task and the app automatically estimates how long it will take and assigns it to a category. Then you can use the "magic subtasks" button to turn the task into a manageable list of steps. The best part? You can even add context about your life, which our AI will use to generate even better tasks.

neurolist also helps you stay present by only showing you one to-do at a time. No more overwhelming lists.

Any to do you create you can get back with one easy tap via the task library. Ultimate flexibility.

To help you actually do your to-do's, neurolist has a smart timer, which lets you complete each task like a playlist, with a timer for each subtask. Then it dynamically estimates how long it will take to complete, while notifying you via voice notifications along the way. Perfect to avoid ADHD procrastination.

This is just the beginning: In the future neurolist will allow you to give more context on each task and will provide advanced productivity analytics.

title: Llama Life ADHD Routine & Task
description:
Hey friend! Welcome to Llama Life! Llama Life is designed to help you focus on ONE thing at a time (single-tasking), and to provide just a liiitle more structure (but not too much) to get things done.

We know you‚Äôve been waiting (thank you!) and we‚Äôre super excited to bring our community the mobile app, to help you get through your tasks in the fun, whimsical way, that you know and love. It‚Äôs the same tool as the desktop version but adapted for mobile so you can have Llama Life on the go.

HOW DOES LLAMA LIFE WORK?

If you‚Äôre new here, a big warm hug! (Anddd, where have you been?!)

Llama Life let‚Äôs you set a countdown timer on *every* task. This concept is called ‚Äòtimeboxing‚Äô, and the idea is to create a (positive) constraint around the time we have to do something. The goal is to try and give a task 100% of our attention, until the timer runs out. This helps to increase focus, and gives us the mental space to think about ONE thing at a time.

Llama Life also let‚Äôs you know your total List Time, and the estimated finishing time, so you can be more aware of time passing, and plan your day.

We also love celebrating the wins, big or small, so very importantly, you get confetti (woo hoo!) when you finish a task. You can also personalize with color and emoji to get lots of variety and keep things fresh!

Llama Life offers a 7-day free trial, with a Monthly or Annual subscription.

We‚Äôre so glad you‚Äôre here, and are rooting for your success!

Let‚Äôs go!

Your Llama Life team, and productivity besties,

Marie, Nhi & Guille + Lulu (the llama)

PS - thank you to our community for all the kind words and support to help bring this to life...

...

"This morning I found Llama Life. I added my Things 3 day tasks. And an hour later, everything is finished. But what surprises me the most is that I feel calm...I was looking for an app to stay focused (with my ADHD), I think I found it" - Julien E.

"I have been using llama life to crush tasks at my new job this last week. I cannot tell you how satisfying it is to check tasks off in there. I love it so much. Thank you" - Nate N.

"I have tried a ton of them and the best one so far is Llama Life for that very reason. Simple, relaxing, takes away stress instead of replacing it." - Dustin M.

"Llama Life has taken what used to be the most anxiety-inducing part of my day and has given me permission to reframe my tasks in a fun, approachable way." - Izzie C.

"I immediately fell in love because it‚Äôs a digitized way of how I do work - I used to do pomodoro, but not all tasks are equal. Llama Life is pomodoro on steroids!" - Stephen S.

"So useful for both staying focused and staying realistic (love love love the "End time" calculation). I've tried a bunch of timers and pomodoro type things and this is by far the longest I've stuck with one! I think a lot of little touches you've added make a big difference" - Michael C.

"I just found out about Llama Life from an ADHD account on Instagram and honestly, it‚Äôs a game changer." - Gilligan M.

"I have to tell you I‚Äôve been blown away by how focused and productive I am when I‚Äôm using Llama Life. I honestly haven‚Äôt found anything that has worked this well for me" - Katy W.
